Dubthach H. Sochuind uasal-shacart na Ferta, Donngus espoc Atha Cliath, Aedh m Mael Isu m comarba Patraic.
Gilla Ciaran m. m. Ualgairg muire H. n-Duib Innracht a suis occisus est.
H. h-Eicnigh ri Fer Manach do marbadh a suis.
Maidm Ard Achadh ria n-Dail Araide for Ultu dú i torchair Gilla Comgaill H. Cairill.
Teidm mor i n-Erinn coro marb ár doene o Kl. Auguist co Belltaine iar cinn .i. bliadhain na mortla.
Muircertach H. Cairre muire Ceniuil Oenghusa &ersir; ridomna Ailigh moritur.
Cairpri H. Ceithernaigh in penitencia moritur .i. uasal-espoc H. Ceinnselaigh.
Goffraigh Meranach ri Gall mortus est.

p.date: Kl. Ianair .iii. f. l. ii. Anno Domini m.xc.ui.

div2.p: Flann H. Anbeidh ri Deisceirt Airghiall, Mael Patraic m. Ermedaigh episcopus Ard Macha, Coluim H. Anradhan airchinnech Ruis Ailithir, Flann H. Muirecán airchinnech Aentruim in Christo dormierunt.
Mathgamain H. Segdhai ri Corco Duibhne, Conchobur H. Anniaraidh ri Ciannacht &ersir; H. Cein ri H. M. Cairthinn do comthuitim i cliathaibh.
Uamon mór for feraibh Erenn ria feil Eoin na bliadna-sa co ro thesairc Dia tria troisctibh comarba Patraic &ersir; cleirech n-Erenn archena.
Mac Dubghaill H. Mael Chothaigh do marbadh dó Ú Inneirghi.
Muircertach H. Dubhdai ri H. n-Amhalgadha do marbadh a suis.
Mottadhan H. Mottadhan rí Sil Anmchadha mortus est.
Cu Uladh H. Ceilecan .i. ridamna Airgiall do marbadh la Coicedh n-Erenn .i. la h-Ultu.
Gilla Ossen m. m. Corten ri Dealbna occisus est.
H. Cathail airchinnech Tuama Greine in Christo quiéuit.
Eogan H. Cernaigh airchinnech Daire in nondecim Kl. Enair quiéuit.
Kl. Ianair .u. f. l. xiii. Anno Domini m.xc.uii.
Lerghus H. Cruimthir comarba Comghaill post penitenciam obtimam obiit.
Tadhg m. Ruaidri H. Concobair ridomna Conacht a suis occisus est.
Flannacan Ruadh airchinnech Ruis Comain in pace quieuit.
Cloicthech Mainistrech cona lebraibh &ersir; taiscedhaibh imdhaibh do loscadh.
Mael Brigte m. in t-Sair H. Brolcan uasal-espoc Cille Dara &ersir; Coicidh Laigen post penitenciam optimam quiéuit.

Slogadh la Muircertach H. m-Briain &ersir; la Leth Mogha co Magh Muirtemhne. Slogadh dano la Domnall H. Lochlainn co Tuaiscert Erenn co Fidh Conaille do thabairt catha doibh co rus-tairmesc Domnall comarba Patraic fo gné sith.
Lochlann H. Duibh Dara ri Fernmuighi do marbadh do Uib Briuin Breifne.
Cno-mhes mor isin bliadhain-si: xxx. bliadhan on chnó-mhes aile gusan cno mhes-sa .i. bliadhain na cnó finn .i. co fogaibthi sesedach cno ar aen-pinginn.

p.date: Kl. Ianair ui. f. l. xx.iiii. Anno Domini m.xc.uiii.

div2.p: Flaithbertach H. Flaithbertaigh ri Iarthair Connacht do marbadh do Sil Muiredhaigh.
Tri longa do longaibh Gall na n-Innsi do shlat do Ulltaibh &ersir; a fairenn do marbadh .i. .xx. ar .c. uel paulo plus.
Mael Isu ua Stuir scriba philosophię Mumunensium immo omnium Scotorum in Christo quieuit.
Diarmait m. Enna m. Diarmata ri Laigen do marbadh do Cloinn Murchadha m Diarmata .i. for lar Cille Dara.
Eochaidh comarba Ciannain post penitenciam obiit.
Rónan H. Daimin comarba Feicin Fobuir prius &ersir; religiosus optimus post &ersir; Mael Martain H. Cellaigh comarba Mhura Othna largus et sapiens in una die in pace quiéuerunt.
Flaithbertach m. Tigernaigh Bairccidh comarba Finnian in perigrinatione quieuit.

Domnall oa Enna uasal-espoc Iarthair Eorpa &ersir; tobur condercli in domain sui in uird cechtardha .i. Roman &ersir; na n-Goeidhel post penitenciam optimam suam uitam feliciter h-i décim Kl. Decimber finiuit.
M. Maras Cairbrech anmcara toghaidhi, Domnall m Robartaigh comarba Coluim Cille fri re in pace dormierunt.
Maidm Feirtsi Suilidhe for Cenel Conaill ria Cenel n-Eogain i torchair Eicertach H. Toircert &ersir; alii multi.

p.add: In hoc anno Aed H. Maeil Eoin comarba Ciarain Cluana Mc. Nois natus est.

p.date: Kl. Ianair uii. f. l. u. Anno Domini m.xc.ix.

div2.p: Ascalt mor fo Erinn uile.
Cenannus ab igne disipata est.
Diarmait H. Mael Athgen airchinnech Duin in nocte Pasce quieuit.
Ceall Dara demedia parte cremata est.
Caencomrac H. Baighill do ghabail epscoboiti Arda Macha dia Domnaigh Cengcigis.
Donnchadh m. m. Maenaigh abbas Ia, Uamhnachan ua Meic Tire comarba M. Leinin, Annud H. Longarcan comarba Coluim m Cremthainn in pace pausauerunt.
Slogadh la Muircertach H. m-Briain &ersir; la Leth Mogha co Sliabh Fhuait co n-derna Domnall comarba Patraic sith m-bliadhna etarru &ersir; Tuaiscert n-Erenn.

Slogadh la Domnall H. Lochlainn &ersir; la Tuaiscert n-Erenn tar Tuaim i n-Ulltaibh; Ulaidh dano i Craibh Telcha i l-longport. Comhraicit a n-di marc-sloigh, maidhes for marc-sluagh Uladh &ersir; marbtair H. Amhrain ann. Facbaid Ulaidh iar sin a longport &ersir; loiscit Cenel n-Eogain é &ersir; tescait Craibh Tealcha. Do-berar doibh iar sin da eteri &ersir; comarba Comghaill i l-laim fria da eteri aile.
Tuctha geill Uladh ar eicin
innisit fiadhain co feigh
la Domnall H. Flainn mur leomhain
&ersir; la sil no clainn Eogain fheil.
Da etire trena tuctha
do loechraidh Uladh o chein
in tres cen dibh abb Comgaill
do righadh Domnaill H. Neill.
In nomaid bliadhain ar nochat
ar mile bliadhain co m-blaidh
o gein Crist cinnti cen crinadh
is innti ro siledh sein.
Damh liac Arda Sratha do loscudh do Feraibh na Craibe for Uibh Fiacrach.
Ruaidri H. Ruadhacan ri Eirthir Airghiall &ersir; maccaim righ Erenn in .xlu. anno regni sui in decimo Kalendarum Decimbris suam uitam finiuit.

p.date: Kl. Ianair i. f. l. xui. Anno Domini m.c.

div2.p: Flann H. Cinaedha airchinnech Atha Truim ard-ollam Midhe.
Donnchadh m Eochadha ri Uladh &ersir; drem do maithibh Uladh ime do ghabail la Domnall H. Lochlainn la righ n-Ailigh i quint. Kl. Iuin.
Crech la Domnall H. Lochlainn co ro ort feru Bregh &ersir; Fine Gall.
Slogadh la Muircertach H. m-Briain co h-Ęs Ruaidh.
Longus Atha Cliath co h-Inis n-Eogain coro ladh a n-ár eter bathadh &ersir; marbadh.
M. m. Gilla Coluim ui Domhnaill ri Ceniui a suis occisus est.
Assid H. Amhran muire Dal Fiatach, Gilla Brighdi H. Cuirc ri Muscraidhe Bregain, Gilla na Noebh H. h-Eidhinn ri H. Fiacrach mortui sunt.
Echri H. Mael Muire ri Ciannacht do marbadh d'Ó Chonchobair Ciannacht.

p.frn: Hoc anno ecclesia sancti Sinelli de Claininis fundata est.

p.date: Kl. Ianair iii f. l. xx.uii. Anno Domini m.c.i.

div2.p: Donnchadh mc. Aedha H. Ruairc do marbadh do Feraibh Manach.
Riagan espoc Droma Moir &ersir; coicidh Uladh in pace quiéuit.
Inis Cathaigh do orcain do Ghallaibh.

Slogadh la Muircertach H. m-Briain &ersir; la Leth Mogha i Conachtaibh dar Es Ruaidh i Tir n-Eogain coro scailset Aileach &ersir; co ro loiscset &ersir; co ro sharaigset ill-cella archena im Fathain Mura &ersir; im Ard Sratha. Do-llotur iar sin for Fertais Chamsa coro loiscset Cuil Rathain &ersir; co n-dernaisit duinebadh ann. Gabais giallu Uladh iar sin. Do-luidh tar Slighidh Midluacra dia thigh.
Crech la Donnchadh H. Mael Sechlainn i Fernmuigh conus-taraidh H. Cerbhaill &ersir; co ro marb da c. dibh uel paulo plus.
Ferdomnach episcopus Cille Dara in pace quiéuit.
Cathal H. Muirican ri Tethfa decollatus est.

Donnchadh H. Eochadha ri Uladh do fuaslucudh a cuibrich la Domnall m. m. Lochlainn la righ n-Ailigh tar cenn a mic &ersir; a comaltai .i. i n-dom liac Arda Macha tre impidhe comarba Patraic &ersir; samhtha Patraic archena iar comlugha fo bachaill Isa &ersir; fo minnaibh archena in .xi. Kl. Ianair.

p.date: KI. Ianair iiii f. l. ix. Anno Domini m.c.ii.

div2.p: Sort Coluim Cille do loscadh.
Donnchadh m. Echri H Aitidh ridomna H. n-Eachach do marbadh do Ulltaibh .i. isin coiced mis iar sarughudh Patraic do.
Domnall m. Tigernain H. Ruairc ri Conmaicne do marbadh do Conmaicnibh fein.
Cú Mhaighi H. Cairill airchinnech Duin mortus est.
Flaithbertach m. Fothaigh ri H. Fiacrach Arda Sratha do marbadh do Feraibh Luirg.
Slogadh la Cinel n-Eogain co Magh Cobha. Do-lotur Ulaidh isin aidhci isin longport co ro marbsat Sitriuc H. Mael Fhabhaill .i. ri Cairrce Brachaide &ersir; Sitriuc m. Conraigh m Eogain &ersir; alii.
Maghnus ri Lochlainni co longais moir do thuidhecht i Manainn &ersir; sith m-bliadhna do denum doibh &ersir; do feraib Erenn.
Eiteredha fer n-Erenn i l-laim Domnaill comarba Patraic re sith m-bliadhna eter H. m-Briain .i. Muircertach &ersir; H. Lochlainn .i. Domnall &ersir; rl-.
Muiredhach H. Cirduban airchinnech Lughbaidh do mharbadh do feraibh Midhe beus.
Ross Ailithir .i. cum patre suo do arcain do Uib Echach i n-dighail marbtha Ui Donnchadha .i. Mc na h-Erluimne.
Caisil do loscadh do Eilibh.
Mughron H. Morghair aird-fher leighind Arda Macha &ersir; Iarthair Eorpa uile corum multis testibus i ter. Non. Octimber suam uitam feliciter finiuit .i. i Mangarit.

p.date: Kl. Ianair u. f. l. xx. Anno Domini m.c.iii.

div2.p: Scanner crodha eter Feru Luirg &ersir; Tuaith Ratha i torchair ár cechtarde.
Ua Canannan do innarba a righi Thire Conaill la Domnall H. Lochlainn.
Murcad Donn .i. Ua Ruadacan do marbadh si uerum est for creich i Maigh Cobha &ersir; in chrech h-isin do marbadh in Gilla Guit H. Cormaic isind ló cetna.
Raghnall H. Ócan rechtaire Telcha Óg do marbadh do Feraibh Maighi Itha.

Cocadh mór eter Cenel n-Eogain &ersir; Ulltu co tainig Muircertach H. Briain co feraib Muman &ersir; Laigen &ersir; Osraighi &ersir; co maithibh Connacht &ersir; co feraibh Midhe ima righaibh co Magh Cobha i foirithin Uladh. Do l-lotur dibhlinaibh co machaire Aird Macha .i. co Cill na Conraire co m-batar sechtmain a forbhaisi for Ard Macha; Domnall H. Lochlainn co Tuaiscert Erenn frisin re sin i n-Uib Bresail Macha aghaid it aghaidh friú. O ro batur toirrsigh imorro fir Muman do luidh Muircertach co h-Aenach Macha &ersir; co h-Emhuin &ersir; timceall do Ard Macha co fargaibh ocht n-unga oir forsin altoir &ersir; co ro gheall ocht .xx. bó &ersir; impais i Magh Cobha doriise .i. non impetrator &ersir; facbais coiced Laigen and &ersir; sochaidi do feraibh Muman. Atn-aigh fein imorro for creachadh i n-Dal Araide co farcaibh Donnchadh m Toirrdelbaigh ann &ersir; mc H. Concobuir ri Ciaraidhe &ersir; H. Beoain &ersir; alii optimi. Do-lluidh Domnall H. Lochlainn co Tuaiscert Erenn i Magh Cobha for amus Laigen; tecait imorro Laigin &ersir; Osraighi &ersir; fir Muman &ersir; Gaill amal ro batur ina
n-aghaidh &ersir; ferait cath .i. i n-Noin August &ersir; i Cetain &ersir; i ix.xx. &ersir; isin uiii. lo iar techt do Machai. Maidhis tra for Leth Mogha &ersir; later a n-ár edhon ár Laigen im Muircertach m. Gilla Mo Cholmoc &ersir; im da ua Lorcan &ersir; im Muircertach m. m. Gorman &ersir; alii; ár H. Ceinnsealaigh im da mc. Mael Mhordha &ersir; im h-U Rian .i. ri H. n-Drona &ersir; alii; ár Osraighi im Gilla Patraic Ruadh .i. ri Osraighi &ersir; im rigraidh Osraighi archeana; ár Gall Atha Cliath im Thórstain mc. Eric &ersir; im Pol mc. Ámaind &ersir; im Beollan Armuun &ersir; alii; ár fer Muman im da H. Bric .i. da ridomna na n-Desse &ersir; im H. Failbhe .i. ridomna Corco Duibhne &ersir; erri Laigen .i. im H. Muiredaigh ri Ciaraidhe cona mac &ersir; alii multi optimi quos causa breuitatis scribi pretermisimus. Ternatur Cenel n-Eogain co Tuaiscert Erenn co coscar mór &ersir; co setaibh imdhaibh imon pupoll righda &ersir; im chamlinne &ersir; im shetaibh imdaibh archena.
Maghnus ri Lochlainni do marbadh for creich i n-Ulltaibh.
Cathalan m. Senan do marbadh do Chairpribh.
Murchadh H. Flaithecan airchinnech Arda Bó sui ecnai &ersir; ęnaigh &ersir; fhairchituil in perigrinatione suam .i. in Ard Macha feliciter obiit.

p.date: Kl. Ianair ui. f. l. i. Anno Domini m.c.iiii.

div2.p: Feidhlimidh m. Flaind Mainistrech miles optimus Christi in pace quieuit.
Maidm ria n-Ulltaibh for Dal n-Araidhe in torchair Dubcenn H. Daman i frithghuin.
Concobur .i. H. Concobair m. Mael Sechlainn ri Corco Mbruadh mortus.
M. na h-Aidhche H. Ruairc a suis fratribus occisus est.
Slogadh la Muircertach H. m-Briain co Magh Muirtemhne co ro millset trebaire in mhaighi &ersir; isin t-shluagadh-sin ro h-escradh Cú Uladh H. Caindelban ri Loegaire co nd-erbailt de.

Slogadh la Domnall H. Lochlainn co Magh Cobha co tuc giallu Uladh &ersir; co n-deochaidh co Temhraigh co ro
loisc bloidh moir do Loeghairi &ersir; co tarait termonn doibh archena.
Cormac H. Cormaic toisech Monach do éc.
Dunchadh H. Concobuir ri Ciannacht do marbadh dia dhoinibh fein.

p.date: Kl. Ianair i. f. l. xii. Anno Domini m.c.u.

div2.p: Muiredhach mc Cana, Mael Ruanaidh H. Bilrin .i. ri H. Cairbre, Mael Sechlainn H. Conaing .i. do Dal Cais in penitentia mortui sunt.
Concobur m. Mael Sechlainn ridomna Temhrach occisi sunt.

Domnall comarba Patraic do thecht co h-Ath Cliath do denum shitha eter Muircertach H. m-Briain &ersir; m m Lochlainn .i. Domnall conoro gaib galur ocus co tucadh ann inda ghalur co Domnach Airter Emhna co ro h-ongadh ann ocus co tucadh iar sin co Dam Liac co nd-erbailt ann &ersir; tucadh a chorp co h-Ard Macha .i. i Prid. Id. August &ersir; i Sathurn &ersir; i feil Lasrein Innsi Muren &ersir; in ochtmad fichit. Ceallach m Aedha m. Mail Isa do oirdnedh ina inadh i comarbus Patraic a togha fer n-Erenn &ersir; do-chuaidh fo gradhaibh i l-lou fheili Adomnain.
Niall Odhor H. Conchobuir do marbadh.
Muirgis H. Con Chenaind do éc.
Sluagadh la Muircertach H. m-Briain coro innarb Donnchadh H. Mael Sechlainn a righi Iarthair Midhe.

p.date: Kl. Ianair ii f. l. xx.iii. Anno Domini m.c.ui.

div2.p: Crech-sluaigedh la Domnall H. Lochlainn i foiridhin Donnchadha H. Mael Shechlainn coro ortadur Iartar Midhe &ersir; co tárus Donnchadh ann for scemhledh &ersir; coro marbadh é.
Disirt Diarmata cona derthaigh do loscadh.
Tuathal comarba Coemhghin in pace quiéuit.
Ceallach comarba Patraic for cuairt Ceniuil Eogain cetna chur co tuc a óghreir .i. bó cech seisir no agh n-dára cech trir no leth-unga cech cethrair la taebh n-edbhart n-imda olchena.
Cathbarr H. Domnaill ri Ceneol Lughdach.

Ceallach for cuairt Muman cetna chur bes co tuc a lan-chuairt .i. secht m-bae &ersir; .uii. cairigh &ersir; leth-unga cech fuind tricha cet i Mumain la taebh shét n-imda olchena. Ocus ar-roet imorro Ceallach gradha uasal-espoic don chur-sin a forcongra fer n-Erenn.
Caincomrac H. Baighill uasal-espoc Aird Macha in pace quieuit.
Etgair ri Alban mortuus est.

p.date: KI. Ianair iii f. l. iiii. Anno Domini m.c.uii.

div2.p: Snechtai lai co n-aidhce do ferthain in Cetain ria feil Patraic co ro la ar cethra i n-Erinn.
Cenn Coradh do loscadh .i. do ait eter da Caisc co sescait dabhach eter midh &ersir; brógoid.
Conchobur m Duinn Sleibhe ridomna Uladh do marbadh do Feraibh Fernmhuighi.
Maidm ria n-Uib Bresail for Uíb Meith i torchair a n-ár im a righ .i. Aedh H. Innreachtaigh.
Cathusach H. Tuamman ri H. m-Briuin Archaille do ghuin do Uib Cremthainn co nd-erbailt de. Eogan mc mc Riabhaigh do marbadh na dhighail.
Fliuc-dhoinenn mhor isin bliadhain-si co ro mhill na h-arbhanna.
Mael Patraic H. Drucan do gabail ferusa leighinn Airde Macha i l-loo feile Ailbhe &ersir; Mo Laise Daimhinnsi. Mael Colaim H. Brolchan do gabail epscopoite iarnamharach.
Sith m-bliadhna do dhenam do Chellach comarba Patraic itir Murchertach H. m-Briain &ersir; Domnall m. m. Lochlainn.

p.date: Kl. Ianair iiii. f. l. x.u. Anno Domini m.c.uiii.

div2.p: Luimnech do loscadh do aitt.
Domnall H. Anbeith ri H. Meith, Domnall H. Ruairc ri H. m-Briuin occisi sunt.
Ceallach comarba Patraic for cuairt Connacht cetna chur co tuc a óghreir.
Oengus H. Cleirchen moer Dhail Cais, Ceallach H. Coemorain comarba Cainnigh.
Athach gaithi do thiachtain h-i ter. Non. Septimbir.
Tech do gabail do U Mathgamna &ersir; do U Mael Ruanaigh for Goll n-Garbhraidhe .i. Eochaidh m. Duinn Sleibhe H. Eochadha .i. for righ n-Uladh &ersir; a dichennadh leo.
Aedh m Duibh Da Leithi .i. fos-aircinnech Arda Macha adbur comarba Patraic do éc.
Dair-mhes mór fo Erinn uile.
Bliadhain suthach co n-degh-shin &ersir; co n-imad arbha &ersir; measa in bliadhain-si.
Inis H. Labradha do thoghail la Firu Manach.
KI. Ianair ui. f. l. xxui. Anno Domini m.c.ix. et in Chaisc for uii Kl. Mai &ersir; Minchaisc ala laithiu do shamhradh &ersir; feil Mo Colmóc Leith for Satharn Initi.
Gilla Ailbhe H. Ciarmaic ri Aine Cliach mortuus est.
Mael Isu H. Cuillen uasal-espoc Thuaiscirt Erenn, Aenghus H. Domnallan primh-anmchara samhtha Coluim Cille.
Ár H. m-Bresail im a righ .i. im Dartin &ersir; H. n-Echach do thuitim la H. Meith &ersir; la Feru Fernmhuighi.
Slogadh la Muircertach H. m-Briain i foiridhin Murchadha H. Mail Sechlainn co ro airg dreim de Uib Briuin.

Slogadh dano la Domnall H. Lochlainn co Tuaiscert Erenn co Sliabh n-Uait co n-derna Cellach comarba Patraic sith m-bliadhna eter H. m-Briain &ersir; H. Lochlainn co n-dechadur Tuaiscert n-Erenn iar sin co Magh H. m-Bresail for ammus Uladh batur i Maigh Cobha co tardsat Ulaidh na teora giallu ro thoghsat fein doibh.
Cocrich comarba Samhthainne Cluana Bronaigh quiéuit.
Aedh H. Ruairc do thecht i l-longport Murchadha H. Mael Sechlainn fo dó co ro l-la ár tria escaine samhtha Patraic.
Ár H. Meith im a righ .i. Goll Bairche &ersir; dream d'Feraibh Fernmhuighi do thuitim la h-Uib Bresail &ersir; la h-Uibh Echach.
Domnall Ruadh m Gilla Patraic ri Osraighi do marbadh do maccaeb aile ic cor cloche.
Donnchadh H. Duib Dirma mortus est.
Gilla Patraic H. Selbaigh airchinnech Corcaidhe moritur.
Kl. Ianair uii. f. l. uii. Anno Domini m.c.x.
Echtigern H. Fergail primh-athlaech togaidhe in pace quieuit.
Gilla Coluim H. Mael Muaidh ri Fer Ceall iugulatus est.
Cernach m. m. Ulcha airchinnech Cula Rathain in penitencia mortuus est.
H-Ulaidh do arcain Mucnuma dia lar.
Flann h. Aedha comarba Eine Arann mortuus est.
Mael Ruanaidh H. Machanen ri Mugdorn occisus est.
Murchadh m. Taidhg H. Briain ridomna Muman mortuus est.
Be Binn ingen Cennetigh H. Briain ben Domnaill H. Lochlainn rig Ailigh mortua est.
Crech la Domnall H. Lochlainn i Connachtaibh co tuc mile do brait &ersir; il-mile do buaibh no do cethraib.
Maidm Rois no na Ros ar belaibh Cruachna ria Sil Muiredaigh ar Conmaicnibh i torcratur tri h-Oe Fhergaile &ersir; maithi imdha archena.
Bran H. Bruic senoir Iarmumhan, Gilla Patraic H. Duib Ratha fer leighinn Cille Da Lúa &ersir; sui Muman, Ferdomhnach Dall fer leiginn Cille Dara .i. sui cruitirechta.
Cellach comarba Patraic cetna cur for cuairt Midhe co tuc a reir.
Maidm ria Conmaicnibh for Sil Muiredaigh .i. maidm Muigi Brengair.

p.date: Kl. Ianair i. f. l. xuiii. Anno Domini m.c.xi.

div2.p: Doinenn dermair reoidh &ersir; snechtai co ro lai ar cenntai &ersir; altai.
Cathusach H. Lędai do samadh Patraic uasal-senoir Erenn in pace quiéuit.
Lugmadh do loscadh.
Port Lairgi do loscadh.
Ceanannus do loscadh.
Slogadh la h-Ulltu co Tealach n-Óc co ro thescsat a biledha. Crech la Niall H. Lochlainn co tuc mile no tri mile do buaibh ina n-dighail.
Teine di ait do loscadh Duin Da Lethglas eter Raith &ersir; Trian.

Senadh do tinol i Fiadh M. Aenghusa la maithibh Erenn im Chellach comarba Patraic &ersir; im Mael Muire H. n-Dunan im uasal-shenoir Erenn co coecait n-espoc uel paulo plus co tri cetaibh sacart &ersir; co tri milibh mc. n-ecalsa im Muircertach imorro H. Briain co maithibh Lethe Mogha im erail riaghla &ersir; sobesa for cach eter tuaith &ersir; eclais.
Donnchadh H. h-Anluain ri H. Niallain do marbadh dia braithribh i mebhail; na braithir h-isin fein do marbadh do Uibh Niallain ina dhighail ria cenn .xx. aidhche.
Comdhal iter Domnall H. Lochlainn &ersir; Donnchadh H. n-Eochadha econ Cuan co n-dernsat lan-shith &ersir; co tardsat Ulaidh eteredha a riara fein fein do Domnall H. Lochlainn.

p.date: Kl. Ianair ii. f. l. xx.ix. Anno Domini m.c.x.ii.

div2.p: Raith Arda Macha cona tempull do loscadh in .x. Kl. Aprilis &ersir; da sreith Trin Masan &ersir; in tres sreith do Triun Mor.
Congalach mc. m. Con Chaille airchinnech Daire isin cethramadh bliadhain .xc. ętatis sue in penitencia optima quieuit.
Crech la Domnall H. Lochlainn tar Fine n-Gall co tuc boroma mor &ersir; braitt imdha.
Gormlaith ingen Murchadha m. Diarmata .i. comarba Brigte in bona penitencia mortua est.

p.date: Kl. Ianair iiii. f. l. x. Anno Domini m.c.x.iii.

div2.p: Connla H. Flainn comarba Mo Laise Lethglinne quieuit.
Caer teinedh do thiachtain aidche fheil Patraic for Cruachan Aighle co ro mhill .xxx. dond oes troisci.

Diarmait H. Ceallaigh comarba h-U Suanaigh, Diarmait H. Longan maer Muman i n-aidchi feile Padraig, Mael Sęchlainn H. Concobair ri Corco Mruat, Findchaise H. Loingsigh ri Dail Araide in penitentia mortui sunt.
Flannacan mc. Mael Isu adbur abbad Aird Macha iarna ongadh &ersir; iar n-aithrighe thogaide in pace obiit.
Donnchadh H. Taircheirt do marbadh la Niall H. Lochlainn la righ Ceniuil Conaill.
Domnall m. Donnchadha h. Gillai Patraic do marbadh do Gull Gabrain.

Slogadh la Domnall H. Lochlainn co Ceneol Eogain &ersir; Conaill &ersir; Airgiall .i. co Glenn Righe co ro innarbsatar Donnchadh a righe Uladh &ersir; co ro rannsat Ulltu eter H. Mathgamna &ersir; maccu Duinn Sleibhe, Dal n-Araide &ersir; h-Ui Eachach aice fein. Slogadh la Muircertach H. m-Briain co feraib Muman &ersir; co Laighnibh &ersir; Connachtaibh co Magh Cobha i foirithin Donnchadha. Slogadh dano la Domnall H. Lochlainn cusna sloghaibh remhraitibh co Magh Cobha beus i foirithin Uladh co raibhe imeisi catha etarru co ro-n-etarscar Cellach comarba Patraic fo ghne sith. Donnchadh imorro H. Eochadha do dhalladh la h-Eochaidh H. Mathgamhna &ersir; la h-Ulltu.

Slogadh la Muircertach H. m-Briain &ersir; la Leith Mogha eter loech &ersir; cleiriuch co Grenoic. Domnall imorro m. m. Lochlainn co maithibh Tuaiscirt Erenn co Cluain Cain Fer Rois co m-badar fri re mis cind comar co n-dernai Ceallach comarba Patraic &ersir; bachall Isu beus sith m-bliadhna etarru.
Scainnear crodha eter Fhiru Fernmuighi fadein i torcradar da ridomna Fernmuighi .i. H. Crichan &ersir; H. Donnacan.

p.date: Kl. Ianair u. f. l. xx.i. Anno Domini m.c.x.iiii.

div2.p: Flann m. m. Fhlannchadha comarba Mo Laisi Daiminnsi, Mael Coluim H. Cormacan comarba Einne Arann, Diarmait H. Flainn Chua comarba Ailbe Imlecha Ibhair h-uasal-espoc &ersir; fer leighinn ernedach seoit &ersir; biidh einigh &ersir; deirce, Ferdomnach H. Clucain comarba Cenannsa in pace quieuerunt.
Teidm galair moir do ghabail Muircertaigh H. Briain righ Erenn co n-dernai anfabrachtai de &ersir; co ro scar fria righe. Diarmait imorro do ghabail righi Muman ina fiadhnuise cen chetughadh.

Sluagadh la Domnall H. Lochlainn co Raith Cennaigh co tainig Eochaidh H. Mathgamna co n-Ulltaibh ina tech ocus Donnchadh H. Loingsigh co n-Dal Araidhe ocus Aedh H. Ruairc co feraibh Breifne ocus Murchadh H. Mael Sechlainn co feraibh Midhe. Do-llotar iar sin diblinaibh dar Ath Luain co Dun Leodha co tainig Tairrdelbach H. Conchobair co Connachtaibh &ersir; Niall H. Lochlainn a mac fadhein co Cenel Conaill inna aericht. Do-chótar imorro uile iar sin co Telaigh H. n-Dedhaigh i n-Dail Cais co n-dernsatar ossadh m-bliadhna &ersir; fir Muman. Do-dheochaidh dano Domnall H. Lochlainn ar fut Conacht dia tigh.
Aedh m Donnchadha H. Eochadha ridomna Uladh, Donnchadh H. Loingsigh ri Dail Araide, H. Canannan .i. Ruaidhri ridomna Ceniuil Conaill, Muircertach H. Lochlainn ridomna Ailigh iniuste interfecti sunt.
Kl. Ianair ui. f. l. ii. Anno Domini m.c.x.u.

Doinenn dermair reoidh &ersir; snechta on coicid .x. Kl. Enair co coicid .x. Kl. Marta uel paulo plus coro la ar en &ersir; cethrai &ersir; daine dia ro fhass tercai mor fo Erinn uile &ersir; i l-Laighnibh seoch cach.
Diarmait H. Briain ri Muman do ergabail la Muircertach H. m-Briain.
Esce do thabairt do macaibh m. Aedha m. Ruaidhri im Thairrdelbach H. Concobair im righ Connacht .i. i n-Ath Bo co ro loitset &ersir; coro chrolighi dó.

Maidm ria n-Domnall H. m-Briain &ersir; ria Gallaibh Atha Cliath for Laighnibh i torchair Donnchadh H. Mail na m-Bo ri H. Ceinnselaigh MS 1 breaks off here; text supplied from MS 2. &ersir; Conchobur H. Concobuir ri H. Failghi cona macaibh &ersir; sochaidhi archena.
Domnall m. Taidhg H. Briain ridomna Muman do marbadh do Connachtaibh.
Muircertach H. Briain do ghabail a righi doriisi &ersir; do thiachtain sluaighedh i l-Laighnibh &ersir; i m-Breghaibh.
Damh liacc Arda Brecan cona lan do doinibh do loscadh do feraibh Muman &ersir; cealla imdha archena i feraibh Bręgh.
Crech mhór la Tairrdhealbach H. Conchobuir &ersir; la Connachtaibh co ro airgset co Luimnech .i. Tuathmuma co rucsat borroma diairmhidhe &ersir; brait imdha.
Mael Sechlainn H. Mael Sechlainn ridomna Temhrach occisus est.
Kl. Ianair uii. f. l. xiii. Anno Domini m.c.x.ui.
Ceallach comarba Patraic for cuairt Conacht don dara cur co tuc a lan-chuairt.
Ceall Da Lua cona tempoll do loscadh.
Corcach Mor Muman &ersir; Imlech Ibhair, dairtech Mael Isu Ui Brolchan &ersir; blodh do Lis Mhor, Achadh m-Bo Cainnigh, Cluain Iraird cremata est.
Tech n-abbadh mor Arda Macha co fichit taighi ime do loscadh i tosuch Corghais na bliadhna-sa.

Maghna pestilentia; famis adhuc ardet i l-Leith Mogha eter Laighnichu &ersir; Muimnechu coro fhasaigh cealla &ersir; duine &ersir; tuatha &ersir; co ro esraigh fo Erinn &ersir; dar muir &ersir; co ro la ár inna mete machthata.
Ladhmunn m. Domnaill h. righ Alban do mharbadh do feraibh Moriab.
Derbail ingen Toirrdelbaigh H. Briain mortua est.
Kl. Ianair .ii. f. l. xx.iiii. Anno Domini m.c.x.uii.
Conchobur H. Cairillan do marbadh do Feraibh Manach.
Cathusach H. Cnaill uasal-espoc Connacht in Christo dormierunt.

Mael Brighte m. Ronan comarba Cenannsa &ersir; ar muinntiri Cenannsa ime do marbadh do Aedh H. Ruairc &ersir; do Uib Briuin i n-aine Domnaigh Cruim Duban. Ps. 33:17 Facies Domini super facientes scelera ut perdat de terra memoriam eorum.

Cath .i. cath Lecan do denamh do Brian m. Murchadha &ersir; do macaibh m. Cathail H. Concobair co Connachtaibh impu fri Tairrdhealbach m. n-Diarmata &ersir; fri Dal Cais co remaidh for Dal Cais &ersir; co ro ladh a n-ár.
Ár Ceniuil n-Eogain na h-Innsi do chor la Cenel Conaill ocus maithi imdai do thuitim ann.

Cathusach H. Cnaaill uasal-espoc Conacht, Flann H. Sculu espoc Connere, Mael Muire espoc Duin Da Lethglas, Gilla Mo Chua m. Camchuarta episcopus Daim Liacc, Ceallach H. Colman espoc Ferna, Anmchadh H. h-Anmchadha espoc Arda Ferta Brenaind, Muiredhach H. h-Enlainge espoc Cluana Ferta Brenaind, Mael Ruanaidh H. Ciflichan comarba Fobair fri ré ciana omnes in Christo dormierunt.

Mael Muire H. Dúnan sui espoic Goidhel &ersir; cenn cleirech n-Erenn &ersir; muire dérce in domain in lxxuii anno aetatis suę in nonis Kallandis Ianuarii relegionis suae magnae optimum cursum consumavit.
Kl. Ianair iii f. l. u. Anno Domini m.c.x.uiii.
Laidhgnen H. Duib Dara ri Fer Manach do mharbadh do Uibh Fiachrach &ersir; d'Feraibh na Craibhe.
Diarmait H. Briain ri Muman &ersir; Leithi Mogha archeana mortuus est i Corcaigh Moir Muman iar n-ongadh &ersir; aithrighi.
Mess cet n-unga do aidhmibh aiffrinn Ceallaigh comarba Patraic do badhudh i n-Daball &ersir; bidhgadh dó fein.
Paschalis comarba Petair seruus relegiosus cum dilexione Dei et proximi ad Christum migrauit.
Maria ingen Mail Coluim ingen righ Alban ben righ Saxan mortua est.

Slogadh la Tairrdelbach H. Concobhair la righ Connacht &ersir; la Murchadh H. Mael Sechlainn ri Temrac imailli fris &ersir; la h-Aedh H. Ruairc isin Mumain co rochtadur Glenn Maghair &ersir; co tard Desmumain do Mac Carrthaigh &ersir; Tuathmumain do macaibh Diarmada &ersir; co tuc a n-giallu diblinaib. Slogadh aile lais co h-Ath Cliath co tuc m righ Temrach boi i l-laim Gall &ersir; giallu Gall fadhein &ersir; giallu Laigen &ersir; Osraighi.

Scel ingnadh indisit na h-ailitrigh .i. talamh-cumscugud mór i Sleib Elpa coro modhaigh il-cathracha &ersir; ar n-doine inntibh. Sgel ingnadh aile a n-Erinn .i. murduchonn do ghabail do iasgairibh Coradh Lis Arglinn i n-Osraighibh &ersir; araile ic Port Lairge.
Maidm Cinn Daire for Uibh Echach Uladh ria Murchadh H. Ruadhacan co ro ladh a n-ar.
Ruaidhri H. Concobuir ri Connacht fri re ciana do éc i nd-ailithri isin t-sheisidh bliadhain .xx. iarna dhalladh.
Kl. Ianair iiii f. l. x.ui. Anno Domini m.c.x.ix.
Cenn Coradh do scailedh do Connachtaibh.

Muircertach H. Briain ri Erenn &ersir; tuir ordain &ersir; airechais iarthair in domain iar m-buaidh righi &ersir; aithrighi i féil Mo Choemhóc Leith &ersir; i .iii. Id. Marta in u.a feria in xx.uiii. luna mortus est.

Cú Collchaille H. Baighellan ard-ollamh Erenn ar dhan &ersir; ar deirc ar ainech ar coindercle coitchinn fri truaghu &ersir; triunu do marbadh do Feraibh Luirg &ersir; do Thuaith Ratha cum sua uxore et duobus filiis satis bonis &ersir; cum xxx.u. alis eter mhuintir &ersir; oighedhu in una domu h-i sathurn Minchasc &ersir; h-i feil Becan m. Cula.
Ruaidhri H. Tomrair airchinnech Athna Móre quiéuit.
Flaithbertach H. Laidhgnen ri Fernmhuighi fri ré do éc.
Ferghal Innsi Locha Cré senoir airmitnech milidh toghaidhe De ad Christum migrauit.
Conchobur H. Gailmredhaigh toisiuch Ceniuil Moeoin do marbadh do Ib Dubhdai &ersir; do Clainn Laithbertaigh.

Niall m. Domnaill H. Lochlainn ridomna Ailigh &ersir; Erenn &ersir; tetra Erenn ar cruth &ersir; ar cheill ar ainech &ersir; ar ergna do thuitim la Cenel Moen isin .uiii. bliadhain .xx. a aisi i Luan &ersir; i n-dechmad &ersir; i feil na Tri M. n-Ennac in decimas octauas Kalendas Ianuarii.
Kl. Ianair u f. l. Anno Domini m.c.xx.
Sloigedh la Domnall H. Lochlainn i foiridhin Murchadha H. Mael Sechlainn co h-Ath Luain i n-aighidh Connacht co tarat Toirrdelbach H. Conchobuir breg-shidh umpo.
Maidm Machairi Chille Moire H. Niallain ria Raghnall m m Riabaigh for Uib Eachach co ro ladh a n-ár.
Concobur m. Flandacan m Duinn Chuan toisech Muinntiri Birn do ghuin i Sleibh Uait do Ib Cremhtaind &ersir; a éc de.
Ceallach comarba Patraic for cuairt Muman co tuc a ógreir &ersir; co fargaib bennachtain.
Branan m Gilla Crist ri Corco Achlann do éc.
Echmarchach m. Uidhrein toisech Ceniuil Feradhaigh do mharbadh do Feraibh Manach.
Kl. Ianair uii f. l. ix. Anno Domini m.c.xx.i.

Domnall m. Ardghair m. Lochlainn ardri Erenn derscaithech Goeidhel ar cruth &ersir; cenel ar ceill &ersir; gaiscedh ar shonus &ersir; sobarthain ar thidnacal seoit &ersir; bidh do éc a n-Dairi Coluim Cille isin .uiii. bliadhain .xxx. regni sui isin .iii. bliadhain imorro .lxx. aetatis suae &ersir; i n-aidche Cetaine &ersir; i .v. Id. Febre &ersir; in uiii déc &ersir; i feil Mo Chuaroc ind Ecnai.
Cu Maighi m. Deoraidh H. Fhlaind ri Derlais do badhudh i l-Loch Echach iar n-gabail Innsi Dar Carcrenn fair d'Uibh Echach du i torchair coicer ar .xl.
Gilla Espoic Eogain H. Aindiaraidh ri Cianachta do marbadh dia braithribh for lar reilgi Bennchair.
Sluagadh la Tairrdelbach H. Conchobuir &ersir; la coicedh Conacht i n-Desmumain co ro innresetar otá Magh Feimin co Traigh Li eter thuatha &ersir; chealla .i. .lxx. ceall uel paulo plus.

Creach-sluagadh la Tairrdelbach H. Conchobair bhes i n-Desmumain co roacht termonn Lis Mhoir &ersir; co taraidh boroma diarmhe &ersir; co fargaib Muiredhach H. Flaithbertaigh ri Iarthair Conacht &ersir; Aedh H. n-Eidhin ri H. Fiacrach.
Cloicthech Telcha Innmuinn i n-Osraigibh do dluighi do chair theinedh; cloch do sgeinm as co ro marbh m. leighind isin chill.
Samual H. Angli espoc Atha Cliath in pace quieuit. Ceallach comarba Patraic do ghabail epscopoiti Atha Cliath a togha Gall &ersir; Gaeidhel.
Da sreith Trin Mhasan o dhorus Ratha co Crois m-Brigte do loscadh.
Athach goithi do thiachtain in Non. Decimbir co ro la a benncopor do chloicthiuch Aird Macha &ersir; co n-derna fidh-ar mor fo Erinn uile.
Kl. Ianair i. f. l. xx. Anno Domini m.c.xx.ii.
Aedh H. Ruairc ri Conmaicne do thuitim la feru Midhe ic breith creiche uaithibh.
Scrin Cholmain m Luachain d'fhoghbhail i n-ailaidh Lainne ferchubat i talmhain dia Cetain in Braith.
Sluaigedh la Tairrdelbach H. Concobuir co Loch Sailech i Midhe co tainig m. Murchadha ri Laigen &ersir; Gall ina tech.
Mor ingen Domnaill H. Lochlainn ben Tarrdhealbaigh H. Concobuir do éc.
Crech mór la Conchobur H. Lochlainn &ersir; la Cenel n-Eogain co rangadur Cill Ruaidh i n-Ulltaibh co tucsadur boroma diairmhidhe.
Mael Coluim H. Brolchan espoc Aird Macha do éc ina ailithri i n- disiurt Daire fo buaidh martra &ersir; athrighi.
Aed H. Duib Dirma toisech Na Bredcha &ersir; cenn einigh Tuaiscirt Erenn &ersir; Domnall a brathair mortui sunt.
Kl. Ianairii f. l. i. Anno Domini m.c.xx.iii.

Gailenga do ghabail tighi i n-Daim Liac Ciannan for Murchadh H. Mael Sechlainn for righ Temhrach co ro loiscset in tech &ersir; ochtmogha taighi ime &ersir; co ro marbsat sochaidi dia muinnter. Ternai imorro Murchadh do ainiuch Ciannan cen marbadh cen loscadh.

Ammus anaithnigh do thabairt for comarba Ailbe .i. Mael Mordha m. m. Clothna .i. tech do ghabail fair for lar Imlecha fein &ersir; for m. Cerbaill H. Ciarmaic .i. ri Aine co ro marbadh morseiser and. Ternatur imorro na doene
maithi ass tria rath Ailbhe &ersir; na h-ecailsi. Ro loiscedh imorro ann Bernan Ailbhe. Ro marbadh imorro ria cind mis inti ro gabh in tech .i. in Gilla Caech H. Ciarmaic, &ersir; deochain eisidhe iar n-ainmniughudh &ersir; ro beanadh a cenn de i sarughudh Ailbhe &ersir; in Comdhegh.
Oenghus H. Gorman comarba Comghaill do éc in a ailithri i l-Lis Mór Mo Chutu.

Flann H. Duibh Innsi airchinnech Lughmaigh, Cú Caisil H. Cerbaill ri Fernmhuighi, Mael Muire H. Cóndubhán airchinnech Daire Lubhrain, Donn Sleibhe m. Cathalan sonus &ersir; sobharthu Uladh uile mortui sunt.
Donnchadh m. Gilla Patraic Ruadh ri Osraighi a suis occisus est.
Conghalach H. Laithbertaigh ridomna Ailigh occisus est.
Kl. Ianair iii f. l. x.ii. Anno Domini m.c.xx.iiii.
Torfind m. Turcaill primh-oigthigern Gall n-Erenn subita morte periit.
Tadhg m. m. Carrthaigh ri Dęsmuman in penitentia mortuus est.
Bidhgadh mor do righ Temhrach dia Domnaigh Casc .i. a thech Casca do thuitim fair &ersir; for a teghlach.
Luimnech do loscadh uile acht madh bęc.
Alaxandair m. Mael Choluim ri Alban in bona penitentia mortuus est.
Geill Desmuman do marbadh la Tairrdelbach H. Conchobair .i. Mael Sechlainn m Cormaic m m Carrthaigh ri Caisil &ersir; H. Ciarmeic a h-Áne &ersir; H. Cobthaigh do Ib Cuanach Cnamchaille.
Ardghar m. m. Aedha H. Mael Sechlainn ridomna Ailigh do marbadh la muinnter Daire i n-ainech Coluim Cille.
Kl. Ianair u f. l. xx.iii. Anno Domini m.c.xx.u.

Quint. Id. Ianair imorro for oen diden &ersir; prim fuirri &ersir; is innti tuargbadh a buinde diden for in dam liac mor Aird Macha iarna lan-ecor do shlinntiuch la Cellach comarba Patraic isin trichadmadh bliadhain ar cet o na rabhai slinntiuch fair co comlan.
Gilla Braiti H. Ruairc do bathudh i l-Loch Aillinne.

Sluagadh la Tairrdelbach H. Concobuir i Midhe coro innarb Murchadh H. Mael Sechlainn as a righi ocus co tarat tri righa for feru Midhe. Marbais imorro Domnall m. Murchadha in tres righ ria cinn nómhaidhe .i. Mael Sechlainn mac Donnchadha.

Crech do-chuaidh Muircertach H. Cerbaill ri Deiscirt Fernmhuighi i feraibh Bregh conus-taraidh Diarmaid H. Mael Sechlainn co feraibh Midhe &ersir; co feraibh Bregh co ro marbadh Muircertach ann &ersir; ár a creiche ime.
Kl. Ianair ui f. l. iiii. Anno Domini m.c.xx.ui.
Ennai mc. mc. Murchadha ri Laigen mortuus est.
Sluagadh la Tairrdelbach H. Conchobuir i l-Laighnibh co ro ghaibh a n-giallu.
H. Mael Ruanaigh ri Fer Manach a suis occisus est.
Mael Isu H. Conne sui Goeidhil i senchus &ersir; i m-brithemhnacht &ersir; i n-urd Patraic iar n-athrighe thoghaidhe in Christo quieuit.
Corcach Mhor Muman cona tempull do loscadh.
Domnall H. Dubhdai do badhudh iar n-denam creichi i Tir Conaill.
Righ-therus Toirrdhelbaigh H. Conchobuir co h-Ath Cliath co tard righi Atha Cliath &ersir; Laigen dia mac .i. do Conchobur.

Anfad cocaidh mhoir i n-Erinn corbo ecen do chomarba Patraic bith mi for bliadhain fri h-Ard Macha i n-echtair oc sithughadh fer n-Erenn &ersir; oc tabairt riaghla &ersir; sobhesa for cach eter tuaith &ersir; ęcluis.
Crec mębhla la Ruaidri H. Tuachair i n-Airtheraibh conat tarthadar Airthir co ro ladh a n-ar &ersir; coro dichennadh fadhein.
Muiredach h. Cuillen airchinnech Clochair do marbadh d'Feraibh Manach.
Damh liac reiglesa Poil &ersir; Pedair do-ronadh la h-Imar H. n-Aedhacan do choisecradh do Cheallach comarba Patraic in xii Kl. Nouimbir.
Crech-sluaghadh la Tairrdhelbach H. Concobhair a n-Desmumain co roacht Glenn Maghair &ersir; co tuc boroma diairmhidhe.
Kl. Ianair uii f. l. x.u. Anno Domini m.c.xx.uii.
Sluagadh la Tairrdelbach H. Concobuir i n-Desmumain co roacht Corcaigh Moir Muman co tuc giallu Muman co leir.
Airthir do ghabail taighi Flainn m Sinaigh i Triun Saxan for Raghnall m m Riabaigh aidhci Luain Inite &ersir; a dichennadh leó.
Cath eter Ultu fadhein i torcradur da righ Uladh. .i. Niall m. Duinn Shleibhe &ersir; ár Uladh ime &ersir; Eochaidh H. Mathgamna i frithghuin.
Gilla Crist H. h-Eicnigh ri Fer Manach &ersir; airdrigh Airgiall do éc i Clochar m n-Daimin iar n-aithrigi thoghaidhe.

Fir Muman &ersir; Laigen do impodh doriisi for Thairrdhelbach H. Conchobuir &ersir; a n-geill do dhilsiughadh doibh &ersir; a mac d'aithrighadh do Laighnibh &ersir; do Ghallaibh; araide do-rat-sum ri aile forro .i. Domnall m. m. Fhaelain.
Cearball m. m. Fhaelain &ersir; ár H. Faelain ime do thuitim la h-Uibh Failghi for lar Cille Dara i cosnum comorbuis Brigte.
Tailltiu ingen Murchadha H. Mael Sechlainn ben Tairrdhelbaigh H. Concobuir d'éc.
Mael Brigte H. Forannan airchinnech Arda Sratha, Mael Brighte H. Cinaetha airchinnech Airde Trea in bona penetencia mortui sunt.
Gilla Crist H. Mael Eoin comarba Ciarain Cluana M. Nois sonus &ersir; sobarthu airchinnech chell n-Erenn in Christo quiéuit.
Kl. Ianair i f. l. xx.ui. Anno Domini m.c.xx.uiii. Bisextilis et embolesmaticus annus.

Fir Mhaigi Itha .i. Domnall H. Gailmredaigh &ersir; Cenel Maein do ghabail taighi for righ Fer Manach .i. for Faelan H. n-Duibh Dhara &ersir; a thuitim leó &ersir; sochaidhe do mhaithibh Fer Manach ime.
Gilla Patraic m. Tuathail comarba Coemhgin do marbadh d'Uib Muiredaigh for lar Glinne Da Locha.

Maidm ria marc-sluagh Concobhair m. m. Lochlainn for marc-sluaigh Tigernain Ua Ruairc i torchair H. Ciardhai ri Cairpri &ersir; Cathal H. Rogheallaigh &ersir; Sitriuc H. Mael Brigte &ersir; m. Aedha H. Dhubhdai ri H. n-Amalghadha &ersir; alii multi.
Muirghius H. Nioc airchinnech Tuama Da Ghualann fri re do éc i n-Inis in Ghaill.

Creach-sluagadh la Tairrdelbach H. Concobuir i l-Laighnibh co roacht Loch Carman aisseig timcell Laigen co h-Ath Cliath &ersir; do-roine bo-dhibadh mór in chonair-sin. O Ath Cliath da thigh doriisi. Atá tra michlu an t-shluaghaidh-sin for Thigernan H. Ruairc.

Creach la Maghnus &ersir; la Firu Fernmuighi h-i Tir Briuin co tucsad gabala mora. Beirid Tigernan co n-Uib Briuin &ersir; co sochaidi moir aile forro ic Ath Fhir Deadh. Ferthair tra cath etarru &ersir; meabaidh for Tigernan &ersir; for Uib Briuin &ersir; marbhtur .ccc. uel .cccc. dib i tosuch einigh Patraic.

Sluagadh la Conchobur H. Lochlainn &ersir; la Cenel n-Eogain &ersir; la Dal n-Araide &ersir; la h-Eirgiallaibh i Mag Cobha co tucsat giallu H. n-Echach. Impoit iar sin for a laim cli i feraibh Bregh co fargaibset dreim dia muinnter ann &ersir; co n-dernsat col mór fiadh Dhia &ersir; fiadh dhainibh .i. loscadh Atha Truim cona thempluibh &ersir; sochaide do dhul martra inntibh. Non impetrata pace Dei uel hominum retro ambulauerunt.
Sith m-bliadhna co leth uel paulo plus do dhenum do comorba Patraic eter Connachtu &ersir; feru Muman.
Kl. Ianair iii f. l. uii. Anno Domini m.c.xx.ix.
Mac Maras H. Rebochan airchinnech Lis Moir Mo Cutu.
Gilla Mo Chonna H. Duib Dirma do marbadh do Ulltaibh i n-Inis Taiti.

Ceallach comarba Patraic mac óghe &ersir; aird-espoc Iarthair Eorpa &ersir; oein-chenn ro riaraighsetur Goidhil &ersir; Gaill laich &ersir; cleirich iar n-oirdnedh dano espoc &ersir; shacart &ersir; ais gacha graidh archena &ersir; iar coisecradh tempall &ersir; reilgedh n-imdha iar tidhnacal seot &ersir; moeine &ersir; iar n-arail riaghla &ersir; sobhesa for cach eter tuaith &ersir; eclais iar m-bethaigh celeburtaigh aiffrennaigh oentigh ęrnaigthidh iar n-ongadh &ersir; aithrighi thoghaidhe ro fhaidh a anmain a n-ucht aingel &ersir; archaingel i n-Ard Patraic isin Mumain i Kl. April in secunda feria &ersir; isin cethramadh bliadhain fichit a abdaine &ersir; isin coecatmad bliadhain a aisi. Rucadh tra a chorp h-i .iii. Non. April co Les Mór Mo Chutu do reir a timna fadhein &ersir; ro frithairedh co salmaibh &ersir; ymnaibh &ersir; canntaicibh &ersir; ro h-adhnaicedh co h-onórach i n-ailaidh na n-espoc i Prid. Non. April. in u. feria. Muircertach m Domnaill do oirdnedh i comurbus Patraic in Non. April.
Teach Coluim Cille i Cill Mc. n-Enain do ghabail d'Ó Thaircert for Aedh m. Cathbairr U Domnaill &ersir; a loscadh dó.
Caistel Atha Luain do dhenamh la Tairrdhelbach H. Conchobair.
Gilla Crist m. m. Uidhrin toisech Ceniuil Feradhaigh do loscadh a tigh a altrann h-i Tir Manach i mebhail.
Niall H. Crichan ri H. Fiacrach Arda Sratha do marbadh d'Uib Cennetigh.
Kl. Ianair iiii f. l. x.uiii. Anno Domini m.xxx.
Sord Coluim Cille cona thempall &ersir; co minnaibh imdaibh do loscadh.
Cú Aiffne H. Concobair ri H. Failghi do éc.
Amhlaimh m. m. Shenan ri Gaileng .i. Cocholl Fliuch, Oenghus H. Caindelban ri Loegaire &ersir; sochaide aile do maitibh do thuitim la firu Breifne i Sleibh Guaire.

Bellum itir fhiru Alban &ersir; feru Moreb i torcradar .iiii. mile d'fheraibh Moréb im a righ .i. Oenghus m. ingine Luluigh; mile imorro &ersir; uel centum quod est uerius d'fheraibh Alban i frithghuin.

Sluagadh la Conchobur H. Lochlainn &ersir; la Tuaiscert n-Erenn i n-Ulltaibh go ro thinolsatur Ulaidh do thabairt catha doibh. Mebhais imorro for Ulltaibh co ro ládh a n-ár im Aedh H. Loingsigh ri Dal Araide &ersir; im Gilla Patraic H. Serraigh ri Dal Buinde &ersir; im Dubh Railbhe m Cairtin &ersir; im shochaide archena. Innrit imorro in tir co h-Airther na h-Arda eter thuaith &ersir; chill co tucsat mile do brait uel paulo plus &ersir; il-mhile imorro do bhuaibh &ersir; do eachaibh. Maithi imorro Uladh ima righ iar sein co h-Ard Macha i comdhail Conchobhair co n-dernsat sith &ersir; comluighi &ersir; co fargsat giallu.
Meas mór cech toraidh co coitchenn i n-Erinn uile isin bliadhain-si.
Kl. Ianair u f. l. xx.ix. Anno Domini m.c.xxx.i.
Crech-shluaghadh la Tairrdhelbach H. Concobuir &ersir; la coicidh Chonnacht i Mumain co ro airgset h-Ui Conaill Ghabra.

Sluagadh la Conchobhar H. m-Briain &ersir; la firu Muman i l-Laighnibh co ro ghabh a n-giallu ocus iar sein i Midhe co ro airgsęt Inis Locha Seimhdide ocus coro comruic a marc-sluagh &ersir; marc-sluagh Connacht co remaidh for marc-sluagh Conacht.

Tighęrnán Ua Ruairc do ghabháil Donnchadha Uí Chearbhaill, tighęrna Oirghiall, iarna dhol 'na chomhdhail go Cęnandus i nd-uathadh sochaidhe, &ersir; a chur i laimh ar Loch Sighlen &ersir; ro bói coictighis ar mhís and, no ní is uilliu &ersir; ro fhuasluic in eclus naem &ersir; rath Patraic h-e &ersir; ro marbaid na coimédaigi ro badur ica coimed.

Dorus tempaill Daire do dhenam la comarba Coluim
Cille, .i., la Flaithbertach h-Ua Brolchan.
Amlaim Mac Canai muire Ceniuil Oengusa), tuir gaiscidh &ersir; beodhachta Ceniuil Eogain uile, mortus est.

p.date: Kal. Ian. i. f., l. u., Anno Domini M.c.l.ui.

div2.p: Tairrdelbach h-Ua Concobuir, airdrí Connacht, tuir ordain &ersir; oirechuis Erenn uile ar gaiscedh &ersir; tidhnacul sét &ersir; maine do laechaibh &ersir; do cleircibh, in pace quieuit.
Sluaghadh la Muircertach h-Ua Lochlainn i n-Ulltaibh, co tuc braighdi fri a reir. Ocus is for an sluaghadh-sin dano ro marbadh h-Ua h-Inneirghi for scéimledh.
Aedh h-Ua Canannan, rí Ceniuil Conaill, do marbadh la h-Ua Cathan &ersir; la Feraibh na Craibhe.

Sluaghadh aile dano la h-Ua Lachlaind co n-Deiscert m-Bregh, co tuc braighde Laighen o Mac Murchadha tar cenn a coicidh uile. Do-cuadur iar sein Cenel n-Eogain &ersir; Airghiallu i n-Osraighibh, co riachtadur Clar Dhaire Móir, co tangadur maithi Osraighi hi tech h-Ui Lachlainn.
Meass mor isin bliadhain-si fo Erinn uile. Noi m-bliadhna o'n mhes mor aili gusan bliadhain-si.

p.date: Kal. Ian. iii. f., l. x. ui., Anno Domini M.c.l.uii.

div2.p: Gilla Patraic Mac Carrthaigh, aircinnech Corcaighi, in Christo quieuit.

Cu Uladh h-Ua Caindelban do marbadh i mebhail la Donnchadh, mac Domnaill Shucaidh h-Ui Mael Sechlainn, tar sarughudh comarba Patraic &ersir; Bachlu
Issu &ersir; Mic Lachlaind co maithibh In Tuaisceirt.
Daimhinis co n-a templuibh do loscud.

Comarba Patraic (.i., airdepscop Erenn) do choisecradh thempaill na manach i fiadhnusi cleirech n-Erenn, .i., in Leghait &ersir; Ui Osein &ersir; Grenne &ersir; na n-epscop archena &ersir; i fiadhnuse laech n-imda, im h-Ua Lachlaind, .i., im righ Erenn &ersir; Donnchadh h-Ua Cerbaill &ersir; Tigernan h-Ua Ruairc. Do-rad dano Muircertach h-Ua Lochlainn ocht fichtiu bo &ersir; tri fichte ungai d'ór do'n Coimdhigh &ersir; do na cleirchibh. Do-rat dano baile ic Drochat Atha do na cleirchibh, .i., Finnabhair na n-Ingean. Ocus tri fichit ungai d'ór o h-Ua Cerbaill &ersir; tri fichit ungai aili o ingin h-Ui Mail Sechlainn, o mhnaí Tigernain h-Ui Ruairc. Ro h-escoitcennaighedh dano don chur-sin o thuaith &ersir; o eclais in t-ingrinntidh mallachtach ro sharaighestar comarba Patraic &ersir; Bachall Issu &ersir; cleirchiu Erenn archena: .i., Donnchadh h-Ua Mael Sechlainn.

Sluaghadh la Muircertach h-Ua Lachlainn co Tuaiscert Erenn i
Mumain, co rangadur faichthi Luimnígh &ersir; co tangadur maithi Muman im a righaibh i teach h-Ui Lachlaind &ersir; co fargaibhset a m-braighti aicce.

p.date: Kal. Ian. iiii. f., l. xx. uii., Anno Domini M.c.l.uiii.

div2.p: Domnall h-Ua Longargan, ardepscop Muman, in Christo quieuit.
Sluaghadh dano la h-Ua Lachlaind i Tir Conaill, co ro mill Fanait do leir.

Senodh do tinol la comarba Patraic &ersir; la cleirchib Erenn isin Bri Mic Thaidhg, dú i rabadur coic epscoip fichet, do erail riaghla &ersir; sobhesa ar cach i coitchenn. Is don chur-sin ro ordaighset cleirigh Erenn, im chomarba Patraic &ersir; im in Leghait, cathair do comarba Coluim Cille, .i., do Fhlaithbertach h-Ua Brolchan, amal gach n-epscop &ersir; ard-abdaine cell Coluim Cille fo Erinn uile co coitcenn.

p.date: Kal. Ian. u. f., l. ix., Anno Domini M.c.l.ix.

div2.p: Diarmait, mac Taidhg h-Ui Mail Ruanaigh, mortuus est.
Sluaghadh la Muircertach h-Ua Lochlainn a Midhe, co fargaibh Donnchadh h-Ua Mail Sechlainn i lan-righe Midhe, o Shinainn co fairrgi.

Sloghadh la Muircertach h-Ua Lochlainn co maithibh Cheineil Eogain i foiridhin Airghiall co h-Ath Fhir Deadh. Tangadur imorro Connachta &ersir; Conmhaicne &ersir; Ui Bríuin do leir &ersir; cath mor do Muimnechaibh conícce Ath na Caisberna, do tabairt catha doibh. At-rachtadur imorro Cenel n-Eogain &ersir; Airgiallu im h-Ua
Lochlainn for amus in Atha cetna. Maidhis tra for Connachtaibh &ersir; for Conmaicne &ersir; for Ua Bríuin, amal robatur uile, .i., sé catha mora doibh &ersir; lait na dá cath aile a n-derg-ár: .i., ár Connacht, im Gilla Crist, mac Diarmada, mic Taidhg &ersir; im Muircertach, mac Taidhg &ersir; mac Domnaill h-Ui Fhlaithbertaigh, .i., mac righ Iarthair Chonnacht &ersir; Brian Mainech, mac Conchobhair, mic Thoirrdhelbaigh &ersir; h-Ua Mandachan (.i., Muiredhach), ri h-Ua Briuin na Sinna &ersir; Branan, mac Gilla Crist Mic Branan, .i., rí Corco Achlann &ersir; mac Fhínnan h-Ui Sibhlen, ri h-Ua n-Echach Muaidhe &ersir; alii multi nobiles; &ersir; ár h-Ua m-Bríuin, im mac Tigernan h-Ui Cumran &ersir; im mac Gilla Fhínnen Ui Rotaigh &ersir; mac Suibne h-Ui Ghalan &ersir; mac Con Buidhe h-Ui Thormadan &ersir; mac Aedha na n-Amus, airri Conmaicne,&ersir; UaDonnchadha &ersir; Finnbarr, mac Finnbhairr Oi Gherudhud, toisech Muinnteri Gerudhan. Ocus drem mor do Muimnechaibh, im mac Gilla Ciaran h-Ui Cennetigh. Ocus Mac na h-Aidhchi h-Ua Cernachan do marbadh arnamharach for creich. Ocus tucsadur Cenel n-Eogain boroma n-diairmídhe don creich-sin &ersir; ternatur imorro Cenel n-Eogain co coscar mór dia tighibh iar séin.

Sluaghadh la Muircertach h-Ua Lachlainn co Ceniul n-
Eogain &ersir; co n-Airgiallaibh &ersir; Ulltaibh &ersir; Ceniul Conaill i Connachtaibh, co ro loiscet Dún Mór &ersir; Dun Ciaraidhi &ersir; Dún na n-Gall &ersir; co ro millset mor don tír archena, co ro soiset iar sin dia tír, cen sith, cen giallu. Ocus is don chur-sin tucsat leo h-Ua Gailmredhaigh &ersir; Cenel Maien.
Mael Muire h-Ua Loingsigh, epscopLis Mhoir, suam uitam feliciter finiuit.
Murchadh h-Ua Ruadhacan, rí Airther, mortuus est.
Tri h-Ui Mael Doraidh do marbadh la h-Ua Canannan hi meabhail.

p.date: Kal. Ian. ui. f., l. xx., Anno Domini M.c.lx.

div2.p: Donnchadh h-Ua Mael-Sechlainn, ri Midhe, do marbadh do macaibh h-Ui Fhindallan i mebhail.
Ua Canannan, rí Ceniuil Conaill, do marbadh la Cenel Conaill fadhéin, .i., tech do loscudh d'Ua Baighill fair.
Flaithbertach h-Ua Cathusaigh, ri Saitne do éc.
Finn h-Ua Gorman, epscop Cille Dara, abb manach Ibhair Cinn Trachta fri ré, ad Christum migrauit.
Brodur, mac Torcaill, ri Atha Cliath, do marbadh do Deiscert Bregh.

Maidm Maighi Lughad ria Cenel n-Eogain Tolcha Oac for h-Ua n-Gailmredhaigh &ersir; for Domnall h-Ua Crichan &ersir; for Ua Fiacrach, co ro marbadh drem mór dibh. Ocus is don chur-sin do-rochair co neímh-chíntach Muircertach h-Ua Neill la Lochlann h-Ua Lachlainn, co torchair iar sin Lochlann i n-a dhighail la mac h-Ui Neill.

Sluaghadh la Muircertach h-Ua Lochlainn co Ceniul Eogain &ersir; co n-Airgiallaibh, co
rangadur Magh n-Dula do innarbud h-Ui Gairmleghaidh. At-rochair tra h-Ua Gairmleghaidh i mebail la Domnall h-Ua Mael Ruanaigh, ar erail h-Ui Lochlainn, iar sarughudh cleirech n-Erenn &ersir; a mhind dó. Ocus rucad a cenn co h-Ard Macha i n-éinech Patraic &ersir; Coluim Cille.

p.date: Kal. Ian. i. f., l. i., Anno Domini M.c.lx.i.

div2.p: Ua h-Oisséin, ard-epscop Connacht, ad Christum migrauit.

Cuairt Osraighi do dhenam la comarba Coluim Cille, .i., la Flaithbertach h-Ua Brolchan : .i., secht fichit damh; acht as e a fiach ro taidhbedh ann, .i., fiche &ersir; cethri cet uinge d'argut gil : .i., tri h-uinge i n-gach dam.
Goffraigh h-Ua Raghallaigh do marbadh.

Sluaghadh la Muircertach h-Ua Lochlainn hi Tir m-Briuin : issed do-cuadur dar Comur Cluana Eois, ar fut an tire, co fargaib Tigernan a longport doibh. As sein co Tiprait Messan. Airgiallu &ersir; Ulaidh conice-sein cucai, &ersir; Mac Murchadha co Laighnibh &ersir; cath do Ghallaibh, co n-deochadar uile i Maigh Tethbha. Tainig dano h-Ua Concobuir tar Sinaind aníar &ersir; do-rat braigde d' U Lochlainn &ersir; dano tuc h-Ua Lochlainn a choiged comhlan dó-somh.

Tech do gabail do Chathal h-Ua Raghallaigh for Mael Sechlainn h-Ua Ruairc for lar Sláine, co ro marbadh ann Muircertach h-Ua Ceallaigh, ri Bregh, co n-dreim do mhaithibh ime. Ternai imorro Mael Sechlainn ass.
Imhar h-Ua h-Innrechtaigh, aircinnech Mucnoma &ersir; ri h-Ua Meith fri ré, do éc.

Sluaghadh aile la h-Ua Lochlainn hi Midhe, i comdail
fer n-Erenn eter loechu &ersir; cleirchiu, co h-Ath na Dairbrighe, co rogabh a m-braighde uili. Is don chur-sin ro saerait cealla Coluim Cille i Midhe &ersir; i Laighniu la comarba Coluim Cille, .i., la Flaithbertach h-Ua Brolchan &ersir; tucadh dó a cain &ersir; a smacht, uair robdar doera reime-sin.

p.date: Kal. Ian. ii. f., l. xii., Anno Domini M.c.lx.ii.

div2.p: Errscardugh na taighi o thempluibh Daire do denum la comarba Coluim Cille (.i., Flaithbertach) &ersir; la righ Erenn, .i., la Muircertach h-Ua Lochlainn; dú in ro tógbadh ochtmoga taighi, no ni is uilliu. Ocus denam caisil in erlair la comarba Coluim Cille beos &ersir; mallacht ar inti ticfa tairis do gres.
Imblech Ibhair co n-a tempall do loscadh.

Senadh cleirech n-Erenn, im comarba Patraic, .i., im Gilla Mac Liac, mac Ruaidhri, ic Cloenad, i r-rabatur sé espuic fichet, co n-abadhaibh imdaibh, ic erail riagla &ersir; sobesa. Ocus is don cur-sin ro cinnset cleirich Erenn gradha ardespuic Erenn do chomarba Patraic, amail ro boi riam &ersir; na badh fer leighind i cill i n-Erinn nech acht dalta Aird Macha.

Sloghadh la Muircertach h-Ua Lochlainn co n-ermhór Leithi Cuinn co Magh Fitharta, co rabatur sechtmain
ann ic loscadh arbha &ersir; bailedh Gall. Tucsatur imorro na Gaill maidm for a marc-sluagh, co ro marbhsat seser, no morfheser, dibh &ersir; ni fhuaratur a reir don chur-sin.
Argain Gall Atha Cliath la Diarmait Mac Murchadha &ersir; nert mór do ghabail forro, amail na ro gabhadh reimhe o cein mhóir.
Cuairt Ceneoil Eogain la comarba Patraic, .i., la Gilla Mic Liac, mac Ruaidhri, danach frith inntshamail reímpi.
Grene, epscop Atha Cliath &ersir; ardespoc Laighen, in Christo quieuit. Comarba Patraic do oirdnedh Lorcan h-Ui Tuathail, comarba Coemghin, i n-a inadh.
Mael Sechnaill h-Ua Ruairc occisus est.
Abbacia Buellíae hoc anno fundata est.
An Cosnomhaidh h-Ua Dubhda, occissus est.

p.date: Kal. Ian. iii. f., l. xx. iii., Anno Domini M.c.lx.iii

div2.p: Mael Isu h-Ua Laighenain, epscop &ersir; ab Imblecha Ibair &ersir; abb Bealaigh Conglais fri ré, in Christo quieuit.
Cerball h-Ua Gilla Patraic, rí Deisceirt Osraighi, mortus est.

Mael Issu h-Ua Corcran, comarba Comgaill, cenn crabaid Uladh uile, ad
Christum migrauit.
Tene aeil i faeil sesca traighedh ar cach leth do denam la comarba Coluim Cille, .i., la Flaithbertach, mac in epscuip h-Ui Brolcan &ersir; la samad Coluim Cille, fri ré fichet laa.
Niall, mac Muircertaig, mic Mic Lochlainn, do gabail la h-U Maine.

p.date: Kal. Ian. iiii. f., l. iiii., Anno Domini M.c.lx.iiii.

div2.p: Donnchadh h-Ua Briain, epscop Cille Da Lua, in Christo quieuit.

Maithi muinnteri Ia, .i., in sacart mor, Augustin &ersir; in fer leiginn (.i., Dub Sidhe) &ersir; in disertach, .i. Mac Gilla Duibh &ersir; cenn na Ceile n-De, .i., Mac Forcellaigh &ersir; maithi muinnteri Ia arcena do thiachtain ar cenn comarba Coluim Cille, .i., Fhlaithbertaich h-Ui Brolcain, do gabail abdaine Ia a comairli Somarlidh &ersir; Fer Airir Gaidhel &ersir; Innsi Gall, co ro astaei comarba Patraic &ersir; ri Erenn, .i., Ua Lochlainn &ersir; maithi Cenel Eogain e.
Gilla Patraic h-Ua Mael Mena do éc.
Somharlidh Mac Gille Adhamhnain &ersir; a mac do marbadh &ersir; ár Fer Airir Ghaedhel &ersir; Cinn Tire &ersir; Fer Innsi Gall &ersir; Gall Atha Cliath ime.
Blodh d' Ard Macha do loscadh.

Tempull mór Dairi do
denum la comarba Coluim Cille, .i., la Flaithbertach, mac in espuic h-Ui Brolcain &ersir; la samudh Coluim Cille &ersir; la Muircertach h-Ua Lochlainn, la h-airdrigh n-Erenn. Ocus tairrnic cloch in tempaill moir sein Daire, i faelet nocha traighed, fri ré cethorchat laa.
Amhlaim, mac Gilla Caimghin U Cheinneidig, do dhalladh.

p.date: Kal. Ian. ui. f., l. x. u., Anno Domini M.c.lx.u.

div2.p: Tairrdelbach h-Ua Briain do innarba a righi Muman la a mac, .i., la Muircertach &ersir; sé fein do ghabail righi d'eis a athar.

Domhnall h-Ua Gilla Patraic, ri Tuaisceirt Osraighi, &ersir; Concobur h-Ua Broigthe, rí Cinn Caille &ersir; Paitin h-Ua h-Aedha, cainneal h-Ua Ceinnselaigh uile, do mharbadh do Mac Craith h-Ua Mordhai &ersir; do Laichis tria drochfhatha.
Cocadh eter Fhiru Midhe &ersir; h-Uibh Bríuin &ersir; isin chocadh-sin ro marbadh Sitriuc h-Ua Ruairc la h-Ua Ciardhai &ersir; la Cairpri.

Impudh Uladh dano for Ua Lochlainn &ersir; crech leo for h-Uibh Meith, co rucsat bú imda &ersir; co ro marbsat sochaidhe do dainibh. Crech dono leo for Ui Bresail Oirrther &ersir; crech aile for Dail Ríatai.

Sluaghadh la Muircertach h-Ua Lochlainn, eter Conall &ersir; Eogan &ersir; Airgiallu, i n-Ulltaibh, co ro airgset in tir uile, cenmothat prim-chella Uladh &ersir;
co ro marbsat ár n-diairmhidhe dib, im Echmarcach, mac Mic Gilla Espuic &ersir; im h-Ua Lomanaigh &ersir; co ro ínnarbsat Eochaidh Mac Duinn Sleibhe a h-Ulltaibh &ersir; co n-darait h-Ua Lochlainn righe do Dunn Sleibhe &ersir; co n-dartsat Uladh uile a n-geill d'U Lochlainn tria nert righe.
Diarmait Mac Artan, toisech Clainne Fogartaigh, enech &ersir; eghnumh h-Ua n-Echach uile, mortuus est.

Tochustal Saxan &ersir; Gall Atha Cliath la Mac na Perisi do ghabhail forbhaisi for Bretnaibh &ersir; ro batar uile re ré leith-bliadhna ic a toghail &ersir; nír' fhetsat. Et reuersi sunt sine pace retro.
Mael Coluim Cennmor, mac Eanric, ardri Alban, in cristaidhe as ferr do bai do Gaidhelaibh re muir anair, ar deirc &ersir; aínech &ersir; crabudh, do éc.

Triallaidh Eochaidh doridhisi righi Uladh do ghabhail, co ro dichuirset Ulaidh h-e, ar h-uamhon h-Ui Lochlainn &ersir; co ro geimhlighedh h-e la Donnchadh h-Ua Cerbaill, la h-ardrigh Airgiall, tre forchongra h-Ui Lochlainn.

Sluaghadh aile la Muircertach h-Ua Lochlainn co Ceníul Eogain co h-Inis Lachain, co ro loiscet in indsi &ersir; co rus-múrsat &ersir; co tucsat Ulaidh uile a m-braighti d' U Lochlainn. Tecait iarsin Cenel n-Eogain im h-Ua Lochlainn dia tighibh, co coscur mor &ersir; co longaibh ímdaibh leo &ersir; co setaibh imdaibh archena. As-seidhe h-Ua Lochlainn d'Ard Macha. Ticc iar sein Donnchadh h-Ua Cerbaill, airdri Airgiall &ersir; Eochaidh Mac
Duinn Sleibhe i comdail h-Ui Lochlainn do chuinncid righi do Mac Duinn Sleibhe, co n-darait h-Ua Lochlainn uile do Mac Duinn Sleibhe tar cenn giall Uladh uile: co n-tarait Mac Duinn Sleibhe mac cech toisigh d' Ulltaibh &ersir; a ingin féin i m-braightechus d' O Lochlainn. Ocus tuctha seoit imdha dó, im claidhiubh mic ind Iarla &ersir; co n-dorat Bairche do h-Ua Lochlainn; co n-darait h-Ua Lochlainn do h-Ua Cerbaill é. Ocus tucadh dono baile do cleirchibh Sobaill, tria rath righi h-Ui Lochlainn.

Domhnall Mac Gilli Patraic, ri Osraighi; Maghnus h-Ua Canannan, ri Ceineoil Conaill; &ersir; Gilla Crisd h-Ua Mail Brenaind, taisech Clainni Conchobuir, &ersir; Mac Craith h-Ua Concobuir, ri Ciarraide Luacra, mortui sunt.

p.date: Kal. Ian. uii. f., l. xx. ui., Anno Domini M.c.lx.ui.

div2.p: Domnall Mac Gille Mo Cholmoc do marbadh do Laighnibh fein.
Cu Cuach Mac Gilli Espuic do marbadh do Dunn Sleibhe, mac mic Eochadha.
Aedh h-Ua Mael Fabhaill, ri Cairrce Bracaidhe, do marbadh la Muircertach h-Ua Lochlainn per dolum.

Ard Macha do loscadh
la fheile Senach &ersir; Cetain ar ai laithi sechtmaine &ersir; ochtmadh uathadh ar aí aessa esci: .i., o Crois Choluim Cille, na di sreith co Crois Espuic Eogain &ersir; o Crois Espuic Eogain in dara sreith co Crois doruis Ratha &ersir; in Raith uile co n-a templaibh,—cenmotha Recles Poil &ersir; Petair &ersir; uaiti do taighibh archena—&ersir; sreith fri Raith aníar,—.i., o ta Crois Sechnaill co Crosa Brighti, achtmadh becc.
Cenannus &ersir; Lughmagh &ersir; Inis Cain Dega &ersir; cella imda aile crematae sunt.
Et Daire Coluim Cille ex maiore parte cremata est &ersir; in Dub-reicles do loscadh: quod non auditum est ab antiquis temporibus.
Ocus Ardd m-Bó do loscadh o Ruaidhri, mac Mic Canai &ersir; o mac Gille Muire h-Ui Monrai &ersir; o Crotraighibh.
Eochaidh Mac Duinn Sleibhe do dhalladh la Muircertach h-Ua Lochlainn, tar slanachus comarba Patraic &ersir; bachla Issu &ersir; Donnchadha h-Ui Cerbhaill, .i., ardri Airgiall.

Sluaghadh la Ruaidhri h-Ua Concobair i Midhe, co ro gaibh braighti Fer Mídhe. As-sidhe co h-Ath Cliath, co ro gaibh braighti Gall &ersir; Mic Murchadha &ersir; Laighen uile. As-sidhe co Drochat Atha dochum Airgiall, co tainig Donnchadh h-Ua Cerbaill, ri Airgiall, i n-a thech &ersir; co tarat braighti dó &ersir; co n-dechaidh slan iar sin dia thigh, iar n-innarba Diarmata Mic Murchadha, righ Laighen, dar muir.

Sluaghadh la Donnchadh h-Ua
Cerbaill co n-Airgiallaibh &ersir; co n-Uib Briuin &ersir; Conmaicnibh h-i Tir n-Eogain d'innsaighidh h-Ui Lochlainn tria erail Ceniuil Eogain fein, ar trecadh doibh h-Ui Lochlainn, airdrigh Erenn. Co táinic-sim co dreim uathadh do Ceneol Eogain Tailcha Og do thabairt ammuis forru i Fidh O n-Echtach. Ocus cid iat-sidhe, do treicsit eisim. Co torchair ann Muircertach (mac Neill) h-Ua Lachlainn, airdrigh Erenn, &ersir; rob' é August Iarthair Tuaisceirt Eorpa uile, ar egnamh &ersir; gaiscedh. Ocus ro marbadh uathadh do Cenel Eogain ann, .i., tri fir déc. Mirbail mor &ersir; firt amhra do-righnedh annsin: .i., rí Erenn do thuitim cen cath, cen cliathadh, iar sarughudh dó comarba Patraic &ersir; Bachlu Isu &ersir; comarba Coluim Cille &ersir; Soscelai Martain &ersir; cléirech ímda aile. Rucadh tra a chorp co h-Ard Macha &ersir; ro h-adhnacht and, tar sarughudh comarba Coluim Cille cona shamudh &ersir; ro traisc budéin Colum Cille ime &ersir; toisech mac leighind Daire im a breith d'a reilic.
Diarmait Mac Murchadha, toisech Muinnteri Birn, a suis fratribus interfectus est.

Sluagadh la Ruaidhri h-Ua Conchobair &ersir; la Tighernan h-Ua Ruairc co h-Es Ruaidh, co tangatur Cenel Conaill i n-a thech, co tardsat a m-braighti do h-Ua Concobair, co tarat ocht fichtiu bó doibh,i n-ecmais oir &ersir; etaigh.

Sluaighedh la Ruaidhri h-Ua Conchobair &ersir; la Diarmait h-Ua Mailechlainn &ersir; la Tigernan h-Ua Ruairc i l-Laighnibh, i n-Osraighibh, hi Mumain, co tangadur rigraidh Lethi Moga uile hi tech Ruaidhri h-Ui Conchobair, co ro rigsat h-e.
Gilla Mac Aiblen, comarba Brenaind Cluana Fearta, quieuit.
Toirrdelbach h-Ua Briain regnauit iterum, Anno Domini 1166.
No, comad ar in Kalainn-si tis tic marbadh Muircertaigh.

p.date: Kal. Ian. i. f., l. uii., Anno Domini M.c.lx.uii.

div2.p: Muircertach, mac Lagmaind h-Ui Duibh Dirma, ri Fordroma, tuir airechais Tuaisceirt Erenn uile, do marbadh i mebhail la Donnchadh h-Ua Duib Dirma &ersir; lasin Bretaigh for lar Muighi Bile &ersir; da mac dó do marbadh arnamárach &ersir; mac do dhalludh.

Sluaghadh la Ruaidhri h-Ua Concobhair co maithibh Erenn uime co h-Ard Macha. As-sidhe co Belach Grene &ersir; asidhe co Fernach na Mebla &ersir; co ro tinolsat Cenel n-Eogain im Níall Mac Lochlainn grinne catha, do tabairt ammais longpuirt for Feraibh Erenn. Ro tairmesc tra Día séin, tria bennactain Patraic &ersir; tria rath Ruaidhrí h-Ui Concobair &ersir; Fer n-Erenn archena, co ro iadhsat Cenel n-Eogain im muine shailech i r-richt na sluagh, co n-dechaidh cach i n-ár a cheile annsin, cenmothat doine do marbadh. Co ro triallsad na sluaigh iar sin im h-Ua Conchobair dul do innredh &ersir; loscudh Tire Eogain, co tangadur drem do Chenel
Eogain i n-a thech &ersir; co n-dardsat braighti do &ersir; co n-dechatar iar sin, ar fut Fer Manach &ersir; do Ess Ruaidh, ímslan dia tigh.
Mael Michel Mac Doithechan uasal-shacart &ersir; fer leighinn i n-Ard Macha, suam uitam feliciter finiuit.
Muiredhach Mac Canai do marbadh do macaibh Meic Lochlainn i n-éinech Patraic &ersir; Bachlu Isu, iar n-a erail dia braithribh fein.
Uatu h-Ua Con Chenaind, ri h-Ua n-Diarmata, in clericatu moritur.
Diarmait Mac Murchadha do thuidecht tar muir in bliadhain-si.
Toirrdelbhach h-Ua Briain do eg in bliadhain-si.

p.date: Kal. Ian. ii. f., l. x. uiii., Anno Domini M.c.lx.uiii.

div2.p: Muircertach, mac Toirrdelbaigh h-Ui Briain, rí Dail Cais, do marbadh ic Dun na Sciadh do mac Murchadha Mic Carthaigh, rí Desmuman. Ro marbadh fo chetoir mac mic Concobhair i n-a dighail la Diarmait Find &ersir; la h-Ua Faelan &ersir; secht meic righ co n-a muinnteraibh.
Flannacan h-Ua Dubhtaich, epscop na Tuath Sil Muiredagh, sui ecnai &ersir; senchais Iarthair Erenn uile, i Cungu ic ailithri mortus est.

Sluaghadh la Ruaidhri h-Ua Concobuir co h-Ath Luain, co táinic Ua Gilla Patraic, rí Osraighi i n-a thech &ersir; co tarait ceithri braighti do annsein &ersir; ros-leic a sluaghu réime dar Ath Crocha isin Mumain &ersir; se féin dar Ath Luain i Magh Léna i conne Fer n-Erenn: co rangadur
co Grein Cliach, co táinic Mac Cartaigh i n-a thech &ersir; co tarait noi m-braighti dó annsein &ersir; co ro roinnedh in Muma i n-dó eter mac Cormaic &ersir; Domhnall h-Ua Briain &ersir; co rucadh da fichit dec bó fo tri, i n-ainechlann Muircertaich h-Ui Briain, for Desmumain. Co ro impaí h-Ua Concobair dia tigh.
Donnchadh h-Ua Cerbaill, airdri Airghiall, do letradh do thuaigh gillai fhritholmha dó féin, .i., Ua Duibne do Ceniul Eogain &ersir; in rí for mésca &ersir; a éc dé.
Maidm Atha in Chomair for Art h-Ua Mail Shechlainn &ersir; for Airthiur Mide. Diarmait U Mail Sechlainn &ersir; Iarthar Midhe uictores fuerunt.
In Gilla Leithderg, .i., h-Ua Concobair Corcu Mruadh, occisus est.

p.date: Kal. Ian. iiii. f., l. xx. ix, Anno Domini M.c.lx.ix.

div2.p: Damhliac Ciannan do loscadh.
Diarmait h-Ua Mael Sechlainn, rí Mídhe, do marbadh do mac a brathar, .i., do Domnall Bregach &ersir; do Donnchadh Ceinnselach h-Ua Ceallaigh.

Isin bliadhain cétna do-rat Ruaidhri h-Ua Concobair, rí Erenn, deich m-bú cecha bliadhna uadh féin &ersir; o cach righ i n-a dhegaidh co brath do fer leiginn Aird Macha, i n-onoir Patraic, ar leighinn do dhenamh do macaibh leighinn Erenn &ersir; Alban.
Ferchair h-Ua Niallain, taisech Clainni Uatach, mortuus est.
Loinges Roberd mic Stemin do thiachtain i n-Erinn, h-i forighin Mic Murchadha.
Ragnall h-Ua Mail Miadhaigh, taisech Muinntiri h-Eolais, mortuus est.
Conghalach h-Ua Tomaltaigh, fer leighind Cluana Mac Nois &ersir; uasal-shaccart, quieuit.

p.date: Kal. Ian. u. f., l. x., Anno Domini M.c.lxx.

div2.p: Concobhar, mac Muircertaigh h-Ui Lochlainn, ri Ceneoil Eogain &ersir; ridomna Erenn uile, do marbadh do Aedh Bic Mac Canae &ersir; do Uib Caracain, Dia Sathairn Casc, ar lar Trin Moir i n-Ard Macha.
Donnchadh Ceinnsealach h-Ua Ceallaigh do marbadh do Laighnibh.

Sluaighedh la Ruaidhri h-Ua Conchobair &ersir; la Mail Seachlainn &ersir; la Tigernan h-Ua Ruairc &ersir;; la Murchadh h-Ua Cerbhuill cu h-Ath Cliath i n-airis catha do Mac Murchadha &ersir; dondh Iarla. In tan tra ro bhadar ar i n-aighthi ic irnaidhi in chatha, nuchur rathreigset nu cu fhaccadar in dun tre theinidh, .i., teni dhi aitt. Ro shoi dono iar sen h-Ua Conchubair, iar femiud chatha do tabairt dho. Ro chuaidh iar séin Mac Murchadha i nn-Ath Cliath, iar tabhairt breithri do Ghallaibh Atha Cliath dho. Ocus ro fheall for a bhreithir &ersir; ro marbadh daine imdha ann &ersir; ro innarb na Galla.

Braighde Mic Murchadha, .i., a mac fein &ersir; mac a mic, .i., mac Domhnaill Chaemhanaigh &ersir; mac a
comaltha, .i., mac h-Ui Chaellaidhe, do mharbhadh la Ruaidhri h-Ua Conchubhair, tre aslach Tighernain h-Ui Ruairc.

Ath Cliath do milledh do Dhiarmait Mac Murchadha &ersir; do Allmurchaibh tuc leis anair do mílliudh na h-Erenn i n-dighail a innarba dar muir as a ferunn fein &ersir; a mhic do marbadh. Tucsat dono ar for Gallaibh Atha Cliath &ersir; Puirt Lairgi &ersir; tuctha tra áir ímda forru-sum. Do mílltea dono Laigin &ersir; Fir Mídhe, eter cella &ersir; tuatha, leó &ersir; ro gabsat At Cliath &ersir; Purt Lairgi.

Gnim mór aínfial do dhenum don manach, .i., do Amlaímh, mac comarba Finnéin Muighi Bile &ersir; do Maghnus Mac Duinn Sleibhe, do righ Uladh, co toisighibh Uladh &ersir; co n-Ultaibh archena, cenmothá Mael Isu, espuc &ersir; Gilla Domanghairt Mac Cormaic, comarba Comgaill &ersir; Mael Martain, comarba Finnéin co n-a muinnteraibh: .i., Coimtinol Canonach Riagulla cona n-abaidh, ro ordaigh Mael M'Oedoic h-Ua Morgair, leghait comarba Petair, i Saball Patraic, do innarba asin mainistir ro cumdaigsetar féin &ersir; do arcain co leir, eter libru &ersir; aidhmí, bu &ersir; dainiu, eochu &ersir; cairchiu &ersir; na h-uile ro tinólsat ann o aímsir in legait remraiti
conice-séin, cenmothat na inair &ersir; na capai ro batar ímpu isind uair-sein, tria format &ersir; baidh collaidhe &ersir; saint onóiri dó féin. Uair ro díchuirsetar manaigh Drochait Atha é asan abdaine, tria chuisibh dlightechaibh. Uch ! Uch! Uch ! tra. Mairg do-róne &ersir; mairg thir i n-dernadh in gnim. Acht ní dechaidh cen innechadh on Coimdigh; uair ro marbait i n-oín-fhecht o uaitibh namhat na toisigh do-rone &ersir; ro gonadh in rí &ersir; ro marbadh gar bic iartain co h-aínfechtnach isin baile i n-dernadh in comhairle aínfiren-sin, .i., i n-Dun. Dia Mairt tra ro díchuiredh in coimtinol. Dia Mairt tra, i cinn bliadhna, ro marbait maithi Uladh &ersir; ro gonadh a righ. Dia Mairt, gairit iartain, ro marbadh é fein o derbrathair i n-Dun.

Diarmait h-Ua Ainbfheith, rí h-Ua Meith &ersir; toisech marc-sluaighi righ Ailigh, do marbadh do longais táinic a h-Innsibh Orcc isin innsi ro cumtaighedh aca féin for Loch Ruidhe, .i., for Inis Lacain.

p.date: Kal. Ian. ui. f., l. xx. i., Anno Domini M.c.lxx.i.

div2.p: Diarmait Mac Murchadha, rí Coicidh Laighen, iar milledh ceall n-imdha &ersir; tuath, do éc i Ferna, cen ongadh, cen Corp Crist, cen aithrighi, cen timna, i n-einech Coluim Cille &ersir; Finnein &ersir; na naem archena, isa cella ro mhíll.

Ascall, mac Torcaill, ri Atha
Cliath &ersir; Eoan Mear a h-Innsibh Orc tainic a fortacht Ascaill &ersir; Ghall Atha Cliath do marbadh do na Gallaibh cetna.
Domnall h-Ua Fócarta, rí Eile Deiscirt, do marbadh la Osraighibh.
Sadhbh, ingen Gluin Iairnn Mic Murchadha, comarba Brighte, do ec i n-aithrighe.

Crech mór la Magnus Mac Duinn Sleibhe co n-Ulltaibh uile i Cuil in Tuaisceirt, co ro airgset Cuil Rathain &ersir; cealla aile, co rucsat uatadh bec do Chenel Eogain forro, im Conchobur Ua Cathan &ersir; co tucsat cliathadh &ersir; co ro marbsat fer ar fichit, eter toisechu &ersir; macu toisech &ersir; sochaidhe aile maille friu &ersir; ro gonadh Maghnus féin. Ocus in Maghnus-sin dono, do marbadh gairit iartain do Dunn Sleibhe, .i., da derbrathair féin &ersir; do Gilla Oenghusa Mac Gilla Espuic, .i., do rectaire Monach, i n-Dun, iar n-olcaibh moraibh imdhaibh do dhenum dó: .i., iar lecudh a mhná posta fein &ersir; iar m-breith a mhná o aiti, .i., o Choin Maighi h-Ua Fhlainn &ersir; si ac a derbrathair fein ar tús, .i., ic Aedh; iar tabairt eicin do dono for mnai a derbrathar aile, .i., Eochadha; iar sarughudh cloc &ersir; bachall, cleirech &ersir; cell. Donn Sleibhe do ghabail righi ina degaidh.
Ane, ingen Mic Duinn Sleibhe, righan Oirghiall, do éc.

Maidm .i., maidm in luaithredh for Tigernan h-Ua Ruairc &ersir; for Feraibh Midhe &ersir; ar Feraibh Fernmuighi imalle ar faichti Atha Cliath ria Milo de Cocan cona muinnter, dú i torchair sochaidhe
mór, im Aedh h-Ua Ruairc, rí Machaire Gaileng &ersir; ridomna h-Ua Briuin &ersir; Conmaicne. Ro marbtha dono ann cóic toisighe do Feraibh Fernmhuighe, .i., Mael Mochta Mac Con Fhebla &ersir; Conchobhur, a derbrathair, da thoisech Cheneoil Feradhaigh.
Fénidh h-Ua Conghaile, cainnel gaiscidh &ersir; einigh Oirghiall, mortuus est.

Raghnall h-Ua Tuathchair, toisech Clainni Ruadhrach; Gilla Geímridh Mac in Ghaband, toisech Fer Darcacha &ersir; sochaidhe aile maille friu, non longe post supradicta, decimo sexto Kalendas Nouembris mortui sunt.

Uenit in Hiberniam Henricus mac na Peirisi, potentissimus rex Angliae et idem Dux Normannie et Aquitanie et comes Andegauue et aliarum multarum terrarum dominus, cum ducentis quadraginta nauibus. Comadh esin primus aduentus Shaxanach in Hiberniam. Ocus tainic h-i tir oc Purt Largi &ersir; ro gabh giallu Muman. Tanic iar sein co h-Ath Cliath &ersir; ro gabh giallu Laighen &ersir; Fer Midhe &ersir; h-Ua m-Briuin &ersir; Airgiall &ersir; Uladh.

Petrus h-Ua Mordha, episcopus h-Ua Maine Connacht no, espuc Cluana Ferta Brenaind, manach craibhdech &ersir; fer aughtordha, do badhudh isin t-Sinaind .i., ic Purt da Chaíneg, id est, sexto Kalendas Ianuarii.
Tomas Cantuarensis martirizatur.
Domnall h-Ua Mail Muaid, ri Fer Cell, occisus est.
Mael Cron Mac Gilli Sechnaill, ri Deisceirt Bregh, moritur.

p.date: Kal, Ian. uii. f., l., ii., Anno Domini M.c.lxx.ii.

div2.p: Ri Saxan .i., Henricc, mac na Perisi do dhul a h-Erinn Dia Domnaigh Casc, iar ceilebradh Aiffrinn.

Tigernan h-Ua Ruairc, ri Breifne &ersir; Conmaicne, fer cumachta more fhri ré fhota, do marbadh do Shaxanaibh cetna &ersir; do Domnall, mac Annaidh, dia ceniul féin imaille friu. A dichennadh dono doibh &ersir; a cenn &ersir; a corp do breith co docraidh co h-Ath Cliath. In cenn do thogbail for dorus in Duine i n-a sgath derg truagh do Ghaidhelaibh. In corp dono do crochadh i n-inud aile &ersir; a cossa súas.
Tigernach h-Ua Mael Eoin, comarba Ciarain Cluana Mac Nois, quieuit in Christo.
Inis Eogain do fhasughudh la Cenel Conaill &ersir; ar do chor for a doenibh.

Maidm for Cenel n-Eoghain la Flaithbertach h-Ua Mael Doraidh &ersir; la Cenel Conaill &ersir; ár lan-mor do chor forru. Mirbuil tra do noemhaibh in Coimdedh in ní-sin, .i., do Patraic &ersir; do Colum Cille &ersir; do na naemaibh archena, isa cella ro millset.
Mael Muire Mac Murchadha, toisech Muinnteri Birn &ersir; toisech &ersir; ri h-Ua n-Echach, do marbadh la h-Aedh Mac Oenghusa &ersir; la Clainn Aedha h-Ua n-Echdach Uladh.
Lan-cuairt Coicidh Connacht in cethramadh fecht la Gilla Mac Liac, comarba Patraic, .i., la primaith Erenn, co h-Ard Macha.
Domnall h-Ua Ferghail, ard-toisech Conmaicne, do marbadh la muinnter righ Saxan.
Gilla Aedha, espuc Corcaighi, fer lan do rath Dé, in bona senectute quieuit.
Murchadh Mac Murchadha &ersir; Murchadh h-Ua Brian occisi sunt.
Gilla Crist, mac comarba Ciarain Cluana Mac Nois, quieuit.

p.date: Kal. Ian. ii. f., l. x. iii., Anno Domini M.c.lxx.iii.

div2.p: Cinaeth h-Ua Ronain, espuc Glinne Da Locha, do cumsanad co sithamhail.

Muiredach h-Ua Cobhthaigh, espoc Ceneoil Eogain &ersir; Tuaisceirt Erenn uile, in mac óge &ersir; in lec loghmur &ersir; in gem gloine &ersir; in retlu solusta &ersir; cisti taiscedha ind ecnai &ersir; croebh cnuasaigh na Canoine &ersir; topur na derce &ersir; na cennsa &ersir; na h-ailgeine &ersir; in coluim ar gloine craidhe &ersir; in tuirtuir ar ennga &ersir; in noemh De eter doinibh, iar n-ordnedh do shacart &ersir; deochaine &ersir; oesa cecha graidh archena,—.i., sechtmogha sacart, &ersir; iar n-athnughadh eclus n-imdha &ersir; iar coisecrad tempall &ersir; reilec &ersir; iar n-denum mainistrech &ersir; reicles n-imda &ersir; cecha lubhrai eclustactai archena &ersir; iar tidhnucul biidh &ersir; etaigh do bochtaibh, iar m-buaidh crabadh &ersir; oilithri &ersir; aithrighe, ro fhaidh a spirut dochum nime i n-Dubreicles Coluim Cille i n-Daire, i quart Id Febrai, in septima feria. Do-ronadh dono mirbuil mor isin aidhche ad-bath,—in adhaigh do solustughudh o ta iarmeirghi co gairm in coiligh &ersir; in doman uile for lasadh &ersir; coer mor
teinedh d'eirghi os in baile &ersir; a tocht soir-dhes &ersir; eirghi do chach huile, indar leo rob' é in laa. Ocus ro boi amlaidh sein re muir anair.
Etrú h-Ua Míadhachain, espuc Cluana, in bona senectute quieuit.
Crech mor la Aedh Mac Oengusa &ersir; la Clainn Aedha, co ro aircset Trian Mor i n-Ard Macha. Ocus ro marbadh in fer-sin i cind tri mis, iar n-arcain Aird Macha do.
Domnall Bregach h-Ua Mailechlainn, ri Midhe, obiit.
Mael Mochta h-Ua Fiadbra no, h-Ua Mailechlainn, abb Cluana Mac Nois, quieuit.
Mael Isu Mac in Baird, epscop Cluana Ferta Brenaind, quieuit.
Imar, mac MicCargamna toisech Muintire Mail Shinna, moritur.

p.date: Kal. Ian. iii. f., l. xx. iiii., Anno Domini M.c.lxx.iiii.

div2.p: Flann h-Ua Gorman, ard-fher leighinn Aird Macha &ersir; Erenn uile, fer eolach, comarthamail i n-ecna diadha &ersir; domunda, iar m-beith bliadhain ar fichit i Francaibh &ersir; i Saxanaibh ic foghlaim &ersir; fiche bliadhain ic follamhnughadh scol n-Erenn, at-bath co sithamhail i tredecim Kallann Aprilis, Dia Cetain ria Caisc, septuagesimo aetatis sue anno.

Mael Patraic O Banan, espuc Condeire &ersir; Dail Araidhe, fer eirmhitnech, lán do noeimhe &ersir; do chennsa &ersir; do ghlaine cridhe, do éc co lan-fechtnach i n-h-I
Coluim Cille iar sentataidh toghaidhe.

Gilla Mac Liac, mac Ruaidhri, comarba Patraic, ardespuc &ersir; primaith Aird Macha &ersir; Erenn uile, mac óge lán do ghlaine cridhe &ersir; do sithamhla, do éc co fechtnach iar sentataidh toghaidhe, i sext Kalann April, Dia Cetain iar Caisc, octogesimo septimo aetatis suae anno, episcopatus autem trigesimo septimo. Ro boí in fer uasal sin sé bliadhna dec co lan-onorach i n-abdaine Coluim Cille i n-Daire ria comurbus Patraic.
Gilla Mochaidbeo, abb Mainistrech Petair &ersir; Poil i n-Ard Macha, mogh trebair, tairisi don Coimdigh, do éc pridie Kalendas Aprilis, septuagesimo etatis sue anno.
Cath Durluis la Domnall h-Ua m-Briain &ersir; la Conchobur Maenmhaighi for muinntir Mic na Perisi .i., righ Saxan.
Mael Ruanaigh h-Ua Ciardha, ri Cairpri, occisus est.
Senodh Birra.
A. D. 1174. Mael Isu h-Ua Connachtan, episcopus Shil Muirethaigh, quieuit.
Amlaim h-Ua Cuind, taiseach Muinntiri Gillgan, mortuus est.

Muirgius h-Ua Dubhthaigh, cet-abb na Buille,
quieuit.
Imar mac Mic Cargamna h-Ui Gilla Ultan, toisech Muinnteri Mail Sinna moritur.

p.date: Kal. Ian. iiii. f., l. u., Anno Domini M.c.lxx.u.

div2.p: Mael Isu .i., mac in chleirigh cuirr, espuc Uladh, suí ecna &ersir; crabaidh, plenus dierum in Christo quieuit.

Flaithbertach h-Ua Brolchain, comarba Coluim Cille, tuir ecna &ersir; einigh, fer dia tucadur cleirigh Erenn cathair espuic ar ecna &ersir; ar fhebus &ersir; dia tarcus comurbus h-Ia, do éc co fechtnach iar treblait toghaidhe i n-Dubrecles Coluim Cille. Gilla Mac Liac h-Ua Branan do oirdnedh i n-a inadh i comurbus Coluim Cille.
Mac comarba Finnein .i., Amlaimh, abb Sabaill, do éc i n-epscopoiti Uladh.
Mac Cormaic espuc Uladh, do éc.
Concobur, mac Mic Con Chaille segánaigh, abb Reiclesa Poil &ersir; Petair &ersir; comarba Patraic iartain, do éc i Roim, iar tocht d'acallaim comarba Petair.
Maidm ar Cenel n-Enna ria n-Echmarchach h-Ua Cathan &ersir; re Niall h-Ua n-Gailmredhaigh &ersir; ár mór do chur forru.
Gilla Coluim h-Ua Mael Mhuaidh, ri Fer Ceall, occisus est.
Maghnus h-Ua Mael Sheachnaill do chrochadh la Gallaibh.
Midhe d'fhassughudh o Ath Luain gu Drochet Atha.
Domnall Caemanach, mac Diarmoda Mic Murchadha, ri Laighean occisus est.
Sluaghadh la Gallaibh gu Luimneach, gu n-deachadair fair.

p.date: Kal. Ian. u., f., l. x. ui., Anno Domini M.c.lxx.ui.

div2.p: Saxain do innarba do Domnall h-Ua Briain a Luimniuch tre fhorbaisi do denum forru.
Bean Midhe, ingen Donnchadha h-Ui Cerbaill, ben Con Maighi h-Ui Fhlainn, rigan h-Ua Tuirtrí &ersir; Fer Lí, do éc.
Ingen Ruaidhri h-Ui Conchobhair, ben Fhlaithbertaigh h-Ui Mael Doraidh, do marbadh do macaibh h-Ui Cairellan.
Fabor &ersir; Cenannus do fhasughadh do Ghallaibh &ersir; do h-Uib Briuin.
Niall, mac Mic Lochlainn, do marbadh do Muinnter Branain.
Lughmadh do fhasughadh do na Saxaibh.
Caistel Gall 'ga dhenamh i Cenannus.

In t-
Iarla Saxanach do éc i n-Ath Cliath do bainne aillsi ro gab ar a chois tria mírbuilibh Brighti &ersir; Coluim Cille &ersir; na noemh archena, isa cella ro mhill.

Caistel Slaine i raibe Ricard Fléimenn cona sluagh, as a rabhus ic milliudh Airgiall &ersir; h-Ua m-Briuin &ersir; Fer Mídhe, do milliudh la Mael Sechlainn, mac Mic Lochlainn, la righ Ceneoil Eogain &ersir; la Cenel n-Eogain budhein &ersir; la h-Airghiallaib, dú in ro marbadh cet, no ní is moo, do Ghallaibh, re taebh ban &ersir; lenum &ersir; ech in chaisteoil do marbadh, cona térna duine i m-bethaidh asin caistel. Ocus ro fasaighti tri caisteoil i Midhe iarnabarach ar uamhan Ceniuil Eogain, .i., caistel Cenannsa &ersir; caistel Calatruma &ersir; caistel Daire Phatraic.
Cu Maighe h-Ua Flainn, rí h-Ua Turtri &ersir; Fer Lí &ersir; Dal Araide, do marbadh do Coin Midhe, d'a brathair fein &ersir; do Feraibh Lí.
Diarmoid, mac Cormaic Mheg Carrthaigh, ri Deasmhughan, do gabail la a mac fein, .i., la Cormac Liathan.

p.date: Kal. Ian. uii. f., l. xx. uii., Anno Domini M.c.lxx.uii.

div2.p:
Dun Da Lethglas do mhilledh do h-Eoan do Chuirt &ersir; dona riteribh tangadur imaille ris &ersir; caistel do dhenamh doib ann, asa tucsat maidm fa dhó for Ulltaibh &ersir; maidm for Cenel n-Eogain &ersir; for Airghiallaibh, dú in ro marbadh Concobur h-Ua Cairellan .,toisech Clainni
Diarmata, &ersir; Gilla Mac Liac h-Ua Donngaile, toisech Fer Droma &ersir; in ro gonadh do saightibh Domnall h-Ua Laithbhertaigh—&ersir; marbh é do na gonaibh sin i reicles Phoil i n-Ard Macha, iar caithim Cuirp Crist &ersir; iar n-a ongadh—&ersir; in ro marbait maithi imdha aili. Do-rat dono Conchobur h-Ua Cairellan reime-sin .i., isin n-errach maidm for h-Ua Mael Doraidh &ersir; for Cenel Conaill, dú in ro marbadh ár Ceneoil h-Enna 'ma mac h-Ui Sherraigh &ersir; ima maithibh imdaibh archena.

Milidh Gocan cona ritiribh do breith do mac Ruaidhri .i., Murchadh h-Ui Concobhuir co Ros Comain do milliudh Connacht ar ulcaibh re athair. Ro loiscset imurra Connachta fa cetoir Tuaim Da Gualann &ersir; cealla archena in tire ar ulcaibh risna Gallaibh &ersir; tucsat maidm forsna Gallu &ersir; ro dicuirset ar eicin as a tir iat.
