Ro dhall dono Ruaidhri h-Ua Concobuir in mac-sin .i., Murchadh iar sin, i n-dighail in turuis-sain.

Aedh h-Ua Neill .i., In Macamh Toinlesc, ri Ceneoil Eogain re h-edh &ersir; ridomna Erenn uile, do marbadh la Mael Sechlainn, mac Mic Lochlainn &ersir; la h-Ardgal, mac Mic Lochlainn .i., mac don Mael Sechlainn sin. Ardgal dono fein do marbadh do h-Ua Neill ic a marbadh annsein.

In Timpanach h-Ua Coinnecen, ard-ollam Tuaisceirt Erenn
do marbadh do Chenel Conaill cona mnai &ersir; cona muinnter.

Sluaghadh la h-Eoan do Cuirt &ersir; lasna ritiribh i n-Dal Araidhe, &ersir; gu Dun Da Lethghlas, dar marbsat Domnall, mac mic Cathusaigh, rí Dal Araidhe. Tainic dono h-Eoan don turus cetna i nh-Uib Tuirtri &ersir; i Feraibh Li, co ro loisc Cú Midhe h-Ua Flaind Airthear Maighi reimhe &ersir; co ro loiscset Cuil Rathain &ersir; chealla imdha eile.

Niall h-Ua Gailmredhaigh, rí Fer Maighi Itha &ersir; Cheneoil Enna, do marbadh do Donnchadh h-Ua Chairellan &ersir; do Clainn Diarmata, ar lar Daire Coluim Cille &ersir; tech do loscadh air ann, co tainig as amach, co ro marbadh i n-dorus in taigi. Do-roine dono Donnchadh h-Ua Cairellan,toisech Clainni Diarmata, sith re Colum Cille &ersir; re Muinnter Daire annsein tar a cenn fein &ersir; a mic &ersir; a oa: .i., a mainchene féin tria bithu &ersir; a meic &ersir; a oa &ersir; a iarmoa co brath do Colum Cille &ersir; do Mhuinnter Daire &ersir; baile biataigh i farradh Domnaigh Moir. Ocus Mac Riabhach, .i., corn is ferr do boi i n-Erinn, do tabairt do Mhuinnter Daire i n-gill re tri fichtibh bó. Ocus tech dho denum don cleiriuch, isa tech ro loiscedh for Ua n-Gairmledhaigh &ersir; a crodh uile do ic fris do neoch ro loiscset imi. Clann Diarmata imurra archena do dhenum shitha tar a cenn fein.
Uiuianus Cardinalis uenit in Hiberniam. Senudh chlereach Erind i nd-Ath Chliath cum Uiuiano.

Conchubhar
Maenmhaidhe do ghabhail la athair, .i., la Ruaighri h-Ua Conchobhair.

p.date: Kal. Ian. i. f., l. ix., Anno Domini M.c.lxx.uiii. Idon, cet bliadhain noidecta.

div2.p: Concobur, mac Conallaigh h-Ui Luinigh, do ghabhail toisighechta Ceniuil Maien &ersir; Domnall, mac Domnaill h-Ui Gailmredaigh, do innarba a Muigh h-Itha i n-Inis n-Eogain docum Donnchadha h-Ui Duib Dirma. Cenel Maien imurro isin bliadhain cetna, .i., i cinn oen raithi, do dhenamh athtoisigh do mac Conallaigh &ersir; do tabairt toisighechta do Domnall, mac Domnaill.

Muinnter Domnaill h-Ui Gailmredaigh, .i., mac Gille Caich h-Ua n-Eiderla &ersir; h-Ua Fhlannacain, do marbadh mic Conallaigh h-Ui Luinigh, ar lar tighi Domnaill h-Ui Gailmredhaich, i mebhail &ersir; h-airchinnech na h-Ernaidhe maroen ris ic a chomairce. Athtoisech dono do dhenum do Domnall h-Ua Gailmredaigh &ersir; Cenel Maien do thabairt toisighechta do Ruaidhri h-Ua Fhlaithbertaigh. Mebol imurro do dhenum do tri macaibh h-Ui Fhlaithbertaigh for Cenel Moen &ersir; do Clainn Domnaill archena. Domnall dono, mac Domnaill h-Ui Gailmredaigh, do marbadh innti-sidhe &ersir; Tigernan, mac Raghnaill mic Domnaill &ersir; ochtur lan-biatach do maithibh Ceneoil Moen maroen riu.

Raghnall,
mac Echmarcaigh h-Ui Chathan, do marbadh do Cenel Maian i tosach in t-samhraidh-sin. Conad i n-a dighail-sidhe do-rochair Galach h-Ua Luinnigh &ersir; Muircertach h-Ua Peatan &ersir; is 'na dighail do-ronadh mebol Clainni Domhnaill, for Cenel Moen.

Isin bliadhain-sin dono tainic mor-gaith adhbuil, co ro trascair blodh dermair do chailltibh &ersir; do fhidhbadhaibh &ersir; do railghibh dímhóraibh for lár &ersir; for lan-talmain. Ro trascair dono se fichit ralach, uel paulo plus, i n-Daire Coluim Cille.

Is innti-sin dono táinic h-Eoan cona ritiribh o Dhun ar crechadh co Machaire Conaille, co n-dernsat airgthi ann &ersir; co rabatur aidhchi i l-longport i n-Glind Righi. Táinic imurro Murchadh h-Ua Cerbhaill, rí Airghiall &ersir; Mac Duinn Sleibhe, ri Uladh, cu n-Ulltaibh cucu in aidhche-sin &ersir; tucsat taelcadh doibh. Ro mebaidh dono for Gallaibh &ersir; ro cuiredh derg-ár forru. Táinic dono in t-Seoan cetna ar crechaibh i n-Dal n-Araidhe &ersir; i nh-Uibh Tuirtri. Tuc dano Cu Midhe h-Ua Flaind, ri h-Ua Tuirtri &ersir; Fer Lí tailcath doibh. Ro maidh dono in cath sin for Gallaibh &ersir; ro cuiredh a n-ár.
Ammus Cualgní la h-Ulta &ersir; la Galla for Sean do Cuirti.
Gilla Crist h-Ua h-Eodhaigh, episcopus Conmhaicne, quieuit.
Amhlaibh h-Ua Domnallan, ollam Connacht, quieuit.)

p.date: Kal. Ian. ii. f., l. xx., Anno Domini M.c.lxx.ix. Idon, in dara bliadhain do Noidechda, in tres bliadhain for Bisex.

div2.p: Sidh do dhenum do Dhonnchadh h-Ua Cairellan &ersir; do Clainn Diarmata uile re Cenel Moien &ersir; ri h-Ua n-Gailmredhaigh, .i., ri h-Amlaim, mac Menman, .i., derbrathair mna Donnchadha h-Ui Cairellan, ar lar tempaill Arda Sratha, ima minnaibh Domnaigh Moir &ersir; na h-Ernaidhi &ersir; Arda Sratha. h-Ua Gailmredhaigh dono do taidecht isin loo arnabarach do ghabail tuillidh slan co tech Donnchadha h-Ui Cairellan. Mebol áinfhial do denum for lar in airechta i n-dorus taighi h-Ui Cairillan, i fiadhnuse a derbhshethar fein, .i., mna Donnchadha: .i., triar da muinnter do marbadh maroen ris fein, .i., Cinaeth, mac Airt (.i., lan-biathach) h-Ui Bracan &ersir; mac Gilla Crist mic Cormaic, Mic Reodan, .i., derb-comhalta do Donnchadh h-Ua Cairellan.
Ard Macha do loscadh ex maiori parte: .i., na h-uile reiclesa &ersir; ina h-uile tempaill ro batar ann, uile do loscadh, cenmotha Reicles Brighti &ersir; tempoll na ferta.
h-Ua Ruadhacan,rí h-Ua n-Echach, do ec do ghalar tri n-aidhche iarna innarba &ersir; iar sarughudh Canoine Patraic do gar roime.
Cealla Thire h-Eogain o Shleib fadhes do fholmhughudh tria chocadh &ersir; tria dochmataidh isin bliadhain-sin.

Gilla Domnaigh h-Ua Farannan, aircinnech Arda Sratha &ersir; Mael Muire,
mac Gilla Cumain, secnap in baile cetna, in Christo quieuerunt.
Colman h-Ua Scannlan, aircinneach Cluane, mortus est.
Cluane &ersir; Ard Sratha &ersir; Domnach Mór &ersir; in Airnaidhe do fholmughudh do Feraibh Muighi Itha.
Noenenach, mac in fhir leighinn, Ua Touaid, toisech Clainne Finghin &ersir; a n-aircinnech archena &ersir; a comuirlech, mortus est.
Raghnall, mac Mic Raghnaill, toiseach Maintiri h-Eolais, occisus est.
Tuathal h-Ua Connachtaigh, episcopus Thiri Briuin, quieuit.
Sneachta na mure hoc anno.

p.date: Kal. Ian. iii. f., l. i., Anno Domini M.c.lxxx.

div2.p: Gilla in Coimdedh h-Ua Carain, comarba Patraic, do éc.
Mac Neill h-Ua Coemhan do marbadh do Dhonnchadh Mac Cathmail &ersir; a mharbadh fein ann.
Raghnall h-Ua Cairellan do marbadh do Cenel Moen i n-einech Coluim Chille ar lar Daire.
Mac Aindilis h-Ui Dochurtaigh do marbadh do mac Maghnussa h-Ui Cellacan.
Mac Craith h-Ua Daighri, aircinnech Daire, do éc.
Donnchadh h-Ua Cairellan do marbadh do Ceneol Conaill tria mirbuil Coluim Cille.
Aindiles h-Ua Dochartaigh do ec i n-Daire Coluim Cille.

Cath na Conchubhar, .i., Conchubhar Maenmhuidhe, mac
Ruaighri h-Ui Chonchubair &ersir; Conchobur h-Ua Ceallaigh, du i torchair Conchobur h-Ua Ceallaigh &ersir; a mac, .i., Tadg &ersir; a derbrathair, .i., Diarmuid &ersir; mac Diarmoda, .i., Mael Seachlainn &ersir; mac Taidg h-Ui Conchobuir, .i., cliamuin.
Gilla Crist, mac Mic Carrdamna, taisech Muinntiri Mail Shinna, occisus est.

p.date: Kal. Ian. u. f., l. xii., Anno Domini M.c.lxxx. i.

div2.p: Aedh Mac Murchadha, righ-thoisech Muinnteri Birn &ersir; Airther &ersir; in Tricha Cet, do marbadh do Mac Mathgamna i mebail airechta.

Isin bliadhain-si dono ro bris Flaithbertach h-Ua Mael Doraidh, .i., rí Ceneoil Conaill, cath for macaibh righ Connacht, .i., Dia Sathairn Cengcighis &ersir; ro marbad imorro sé meic righ déc do macaibh righ Connacht ann &ersir; derg-ár Connacht archena.

Sloghadh la Domnall, mac Aedha h-Ui Lochlainn &ersir; la Cenel n-Eogain Tolcha Oac i n-Ultaibh &ersir; do brisedur cath ar Ulltaibh &ersir; ar h-Uib Tuirtri &ersir; ar Feraibh Li um Ruaidhri Mac Duinn Sleibhe &ersir; im Coin Midhe h-Ua Fhlaind.

Creach mor la Feraibh Maighi h-Itha im O Cathan .i., Echmarcach &ersir; Cenel m-Binnigh Glinne, co n-dechatur tar Tuaim &ersir; cor airgsetar Fhiru Lí &ersir; h-Ua Tuirtri &ersir; gu rugsatur il-mile do buaibh.
Tomaltach h-Ua Concobair do ghabhail comurbuis Patraic &ersir; co n-dernadh cuairt Ceneoil Eogain leis, co ruc cuairt moir &ersir; co tuc bennactain faribh.
Domnall h-Ua Ceinneidig, ri Urmuman, occisus est.
Donn Sleibhe O Gadhra, ri Sleibe Lughu, occisus est.
Domnall h-Ua Con Cenainn, ri h-Ua n-Diarmata, occisus est.
Acan h-Ua Fallamhain, taisech Clainni Uadach, moritur.

Cath na righdomna, du i torcradar da mac Toirrdelbaigh h-Ui Concobair, .i., Brian Luighnech &ersir; Magnus &ersir; tri meic Aedha, mic Toirrdelbaigh U Conchobuir, .i., Mael Secnaill &ersir; Muirethach &ersir; Muircertach et ceteri.

p.date: Kal. Ian. ui. f., l. xx. iii., Anno Domini M.c.lxxx.ii.

div2.p: Sluagadh la Domnall h-Ua Lochlainn co Dun m-Bó i n-Dal Riatai &ersir; cath do tabairt dó do Ghallaibh annsein &ersir; maidm for Cenel n-Eogain &ersir; Raghnall O Breislen do marbadh ann &ersir; Gilla Crist O Cathan do marbadh ann et alii multi. Ocus Soscela Martain do brith do Ghallaibh leó.
Domnall h-Ua h-Uallachan, ardepscop Muman, quieuit.
Milid Goccan &ersir; Remonn &ersir; Cenn Cuilind &ersir; da mac Steimin et alii multi occisi sunt.

Maidm reim
Ruaidhri h-Ua Concobuir &ersir; reim Concobur Maenmuighi for Donnchadh, mac Domnaill Midigh &ersir; for h-Ua Mael Doraidh, ubi multi ceciderunt.

p.date: Kal. Ian. uii. f., l. iiii., Anno Domini M.c.lxxx.iii.

div2.p: Tachur itir In Gilla Riabach h-Ua Flaithbertaigh &ersir; mac h-Ui Ghailmredhaigh &ersir; O Fhlaithbertaich do marbadh ann &ersir; drem do Ceniul Moen do marbadh ann.
Ordo Templariorum &ersir; Hospitalariorum confirmatur.
Donnchadh, mac Domnaill Midig, occisus est.
Gilla Isa h-Ua Mailin, espuc Maighi Eó, moritur.
Cogadh mor eter Ruaidhri h-Ua Concobuir &ersir; a mac, .i., Concobur Maenmuighi.

p.date: Kal. Ian. i. f., l. x. u., Anno Domini M.c.lxxx.iiii.

div2.p: Deich taighi fichit do maithibh muinnteri Arda Macha do argain do Ghallaibh na Midhe.
Mael Isu h-Ua Cerbaill do ghabail comurbuis Patraic iarna fhagbail do Tomaltach h-Ua Conchobuir.
Art h-Ua Maelechlainn, rí Iarthair Mídhe, do marbadh i mebhail ar erail Gall. Mael Sechlainn Bec do gabail righi ina inad.
Caistel d'athughudh la Gallaibh i Cill Fair.
Caistel aile do milliudh la Mael Sechlainn &ersir; la Concobur Maenmaighi h-Ua Concobair co sochaidhe moir do Ghallaibh and.
Donnchadh, mac Domnaill Midigh, occisus est.
Gilla Isu h-Ua Mailin, espuc Muighi Eo, moritur.
Cogadh mor eter Ruaidri h-Ua Concobhair &ersir; a mac, .i., Concobur Maenmuighi.
Brian Breifnech, mac Toirrdelbaigh h-Ui Concobair, moritur.
Flann h-Ua Finnachta, taisech Clainni Murchadha, moritur.

p.date: Kal. Ian. iii. f., l. xx. ui., Anno Domini M.c.lxxx.u.

div2.p: Mess mor (.i., dairmes) isin bliadhain-si co coitcenn.
Pilip Uínsesra co n-Gallaibh Erenn ime i n-Ard Macha co cenn sé la &ersir; sé n-oidhche i cert-medhon in Chorghais.

Amhlaim h-Ua Muirethaigh, epscop Ard Macha &ersir; Ceníuil Feradhaigh, lochrann solusta no soillsighed tuaith &ersir; eclais, in Christo quieuit, i n-Dun Cruthnai &ersir; a thabairt co h-onorach co Dairi Coluim Cille &ersir; a adhnucal fo chosaibh a athar, .i., in espuic h-Ui Cobhthaigh .i., i toebh in Tempaill Bicc, octogesimo sexto etatis sue anno. Fogurtach h-Ua Cerballan do Ceniul Ellanna do oirdnedh i n-a inad.

Gilla Crist Mac Cathmail, righ-thoisech Ceneoil Fearadhaigh &ersir; na Clann, .i. Clann Oengusa &ersir; Clann Duibh Innrecht &ersir; Clann Fhogurtaigh &ersir; h-Ua Cennfhata &ersir; Clainni Colla do Feraibh
Manach, cenn comairle Tuaiscirt Erenn, do marbadh, .i., i Prid Noin Mai, la h-Ua n-Eignígh &ersir; la Muinnter Coeman &ersir; a cenn do breith leo, co frith uaithibh i cinn mís iar tain.
h-Eoan Sinter .i., sine terra, mac righ Saxan, do techt i n-Erinn, lucht tri fichet long, no ní is móa, re taebh i raibhe reime do Gallaibh i n-Erind.
Mael Isu h-Ua Muiredhaigh, fer leighinn Daire Coluim Cille, do éc ina shenoir toghaidhe &ersir; Mael Cainnigh h-Ua Fercomais do ghabhail a inaidh.
Mael Sechlainn, mac Muircertaich h-Ui Lochlainn, do mharbadh do Gallaibh.

Cogadh eter Ruaidhri h-Ua Concobuir &ersir; Concobur Maenmuighi, a mac. Domnall h-Ua Briain i foiridin Ruaidhri, gur mill &ersir; gur loisc &ersir; gur airg cella Iartair Connacht, gur mharb a n-daine. Cathal Carrach, mac Concobair Maenmuighi, d'argain &ersir; do loscadh Cilli Da Lua i n-dighail na n-olc-sin.
Diarmait, mac Tordelbaigh U Briain, do dallud la Domnall h-Ua Briain.
Righi Connacht do ghabail do Concobur Maenmaigi.

p.date: Kal. Ian. iiii. f., l. uii., Anno Domini M.c.lxxx.ui.

div2.p: Tachaisi mor i Tuaiscert Erenn isin bliadhain-si.
Athrighadh Domnaill, mic Aedha h-Ui Lochlainn &ersir; righadh Ruaidhri h-Ui Fhlaithbertaich ic dréim do Cheniul Eogain Talcha Óac.

Gilla Patraic mac mic In Gilla
Cuirr, toisech h-Ua Branan, do marbadh la Domnall h-Ua Lochlainn, tria erail Muinnteri Branan fein.

Uga De Laci do marbadh d'O Miadhaigh do Tebtha (.i., malartach &ersir; discailtech neimed &ersir; cell Erenn, a marbad i n-einech Coluim Cille ic cumdach casteoil, .i., a n-Dermaigh. Hugha De Laci, malartach, discailtech ceall &ersir; neimhedh Erenn, do mharbadh d'U Míadhaigh do Breghmunaibh, lasin Sinnach Ua Catharnaigh, i n-einech Coluim Cille, ic cumdach caisteoil ina chill, .i., i n-Durmuigh, sexcentesimo quadragesimo anno ex quo fundata est Daria ecclesia.
Innarba Ruaidhri h-Ui Conchobair la Conchobur Maenmaige, la mac féin &ersir; milliudh Connacht etarru.
Conn h-Ua Breislen, coinnel eínigh &ersir; gaiscidh Tuaiscert Erenn, do marbadh do dreim do Chenel Eogain &ersir; Inis Eogain uile do arcain trit-sein, cenco raibe cin doibh ann.
Conchubhar h-Ua Flaithbhertaigh do mharbadh la Ruaidhri h-Ua Flaithbertaigh, la a dherbhrathair fein, i nd-Araind.
Ruaidhri h-Ua Conchubair d'innarba da mac fein, .i., do Conchubhar Mhaenmhuidhe.

Derbhorgall, ingen
Murchaidh h-Ui Maeil Shechlainn, do dhul go Droichet Atha da h-oilichtri.
Ordo Carthusianorum confirmatur.

p.date: Kal. Ian. u. f., l. x. uiii., Anno Domini M.c.lxxx.uii.

div2.p: Ruaidhri h-Ua Fhlaithbertaich, ri Ceneoil Eogain, do marbadh ar creich i Tir Conaill.

Carrac Lacha Ce do loscad i medhon laa, dú in ro baidhedh &ersir; in ro loiscedh ingen h-Ui Eidhin, ben Conchobair Mic Diarmata, rí Moighi Luirg &ersir; secht .xx., no ní is moo, eter fhiru is mna, do loscadh &ersir; badudh ri ré oen-uaire innti.

Druim Cliabh do arcain do mac Mael Shechlainn h-Ui Ruairc .i., do Aedh, do righ h-Ua m-Briuin &ersir; Conmaicne &ersir; do mac Cathail h-Ui Ruairc &ersir; do Ghallaibh na Midhe imaille riu. Acht do-roine Dia firt amra ar Colum Cille ann, .i., ro marbadh mac Mael Sechlainn h-Ui Ruairc .i., Aedh ria cinn caicidhisi iar sein i Conmaicne &ersir; ro dalladh mac Cathail h-Ui Ruairc, risi tangas in sluaighedh i taigh h-Ui Mael Doraidh, i n-einech Coluim Cille &ersir; ro marbait se fichit do aes gradha meic Mael Sechlainn ar fut Conmaicne &ersir; Cairpri Droma Cliabh tria mírbuil Coluim Cille.
Mael Isu h-Ua Cearbhuill, epscop Oirghiall, quieuit.
Muirghíus, mac Taidhg h-Ui Mhail Ruainigh, ri Mhuighe Luirg, obiit.

p.date: Kal. Ian. ui. f., l. xx. ix., Anno Domini M.c.lxxx.uiii.

div2.p: Ruaidhri h-Ua Canannan, rí Ceneoil Conaill ri h-edh &ersir; rídomna Erenn, do marbadh do Fhlaithbertach h-Ua Mael Doraidh tria mebail ic Drochat Slicighi, iarna brecadh do lar Droma Cliabh imach &ersir; brathair dó do marbadh imaille ris &ersir; drem da mhuinntir. h-Ua Gairb .i., Magnus, toisech Fer Droma, ro imir lamha ar h-Ua Canannan, do marbad do mhuinntir Echmarcaigh h-Ui Dochartaigh i n-dighail h-Ui Chanannan.
Domhnall h-Ua Canannan do letradh a choisi dia tuaigh féin i n-Daire ig gaít asclainne connaidh &ersir; a éc de tria mírbail Coluim Cille.
Martain h-Ua Brolaigh, ard-ecnaidh Goeidhel uile &ersir; ard-fher leiginn Aird Macha, do éc.
Amhlaim h-Ua Daighri do tocht co h-I da ailithri &ersir; a éc i n-h-I iar n-aithrighi toghaidhi.

Gaill caisteoil Maighi Coba &ersir; drem d'Uib Echach Uladh do thaidhecht ar creich h-i Tir n-Eogain, co torrachtadar co Léim Mic Neill &ersir; co ro gabsat bú andsin &ersir; co n-dechaidh Domnall h-Ua Lochlainn 'na n-degaidh &ersir; lucht a comhronna fein, co ruc forra i Cabhan na Crann Ard, co tardsat debhaidh &ersir; co romaidh ar na Gallaibh &ersir; co ro cuiredh a n-ár and &ersir; co tardadh sadhadh do ghall-ghai isin rígh a aenor, co torchair annsin i frithguin, .i., Domnall, mac Aedha h-Ui Lochlainn, rí Ailigh &ersir; ridamhna Erenn ar cruth &ersir; ar cheill &ersir; ar taighedhus &ersir; ar trebaire. Ocus rucadh in la-sin fein co h-Ard Macha &ersir; ro h-adhnaicedh ann co h-onorach.

Sluaghadh la h-Eoan Do Chúirt &ersir; la Gallaibh Erenn uile i Connachtaibh imaille re Concobur h-Ua n-Diarmata.
Tinoilidh Concobhar Maenmaighi .i., ri Connacht Connachta &ersir; tic Domnall h-Ua Briain, rí Muman, co dréim d'feraibh Muman i sochraiti righ Connacht. Acus loiscit ní do chellaibh in tire rempu &ersir; ní ro leicset scoiliudh doibh. Im-chloeit imurro na Gaill aniar co h-Es Dara do thuidhecht i Tir Conaill. O 't-cualatur imurro na Gaill Cenel Conaill &ersir; h-Ua Mael Doraidh do bith ic Druim Cliabh, ro loiscset Eas Dara do leir &ersir; ím-cloit aris i Connachtaibh &ersir; tecait isin Segdais &ersir; atn-aghait Connachta &ersir; Fir Muman ammus forru &ersir; marbait a n-ár &ersir; facbait na Gaill in tir ar eicin can a becc do gleudh.
Etaín, ingen h-Ui Cuinn, righan Muman, do bai 'ca h-ailithri ic Daire, do éc iar m-buaidh o domon &ersir; o dhemhan.
Muirchertach, mac Uathu, h-Ua Choncheanaind, ri h-Ua n-Dhiarmata, mortuus est.
Domnall, mac Lochlaind h-U Mhaeil Ruanaidh &ersir; Fearghal h-Ua Taidhg in Teghlaigh &ersir; Flaithbertach, mac Riucca, h-Ua Fhínnachta, occisi sunt.
Muirchertach h-Ua Brain, ri Breghmhuine, occisus est.
h-Ua Mail Ruanaidh occisus est Anno Domini 1188.

p.date: Kal. Ian. i. f., l. x., Anno Domini M.c.lxxx.ix.

div2.p: Domnall, mac Muirchertaigh h-Ui Lochlainn, do marbadh do Ghallaibh Dhal Araidhe acu fein.

Murchadh h-Ua Cerbaill, airdrigh Airgiall, do éc isin Mainistir Moir
ar n-aithrighi thoghaidhi.
Ard Macha do loscadh o Chrosaibh Brighti co Reicles Brighti, eter Raith &ersir; Trian &ersir; tempul.
Echmiledh, mac Mic Canai, sonus &ersir; sobarthain Thire h-Eoghain uile, do éc.

Mac na h-Aidhche h-Ua Mail Ruanaidh, rí Fer Manach, do athrighadh &ersir; a dul dochum h-Ui Cerbaill. Acus crech Gall do thuidhecht isin tir &ersir; comraicidh h-Ua Cerbaill &ersir; h-Ua Mael Ruanaidh friú &ersir; maidhis for Ua Cerbaill &ersir; marbthar h-Ua Mael Ruanaidh ann.

Conchobur Maenmaighi, mac Ruaidhri, airdri Connacht &ersir; ridamna Erenn uile, do marbadh da lucht gradha fein, tria erail a brathar, .i., Concobair h-Ui n-Diarmata mac Cormaic; alias, mac Ruaidhri. Conchobhur h-Ua n-Diarmata dono do marbadh la Cathal Carrach, mac Concobair Mhaenmaighi, i n-dighail a athar.
Ard Macha do arcain la h-Eoan Do Chuirt &ersir; la Gallaibh Erenn.
Mac na Peresi, rí Saxan, do éc.
Mael Cainnigh h-Ua Fercomais, fer leighinn Daire, do bathudh eter Aird &ersir; Inis Eogain.
Muircertach h-Ua Flannacan, toiseach Chlainne Cathail, mortuus est.

gap.reason: annal for 1190 blank in all MSS

p.date: Kal. Ian. (ii. f.,) l. xx. i., Anno Domini M.c.lxxxx.

div2.p:
Long Cathail Croibderg h-I Conchobhair, rí Connacht, do bhathad ar Loch Ríbh &ersir; ro baidhed .xxxui. uiri, im Airechtach h-Ua Radhuibh, dux Clainni Tomaltaigh &ersir; im
Conchubhar, mac Cathail, mhic Urain, mic Thoirrdhealbhaidh h-Ui Chonchubair &ersir; im Murchadh, mac Conchubhair, mic Diarmata, mic Taidhg h-Ui Mhail Ruanaigh &ersir; im Muirgius, mac Uatu, h-Ua Con Cheanaind.
Dub Eassa, inghean Diarmada, mic Thaidhg, mortua est.
Mor, inghean Toirrdhealbaigh Ui Chonchubhair, mortua est.
Diarmait h-Ua Rabartaigh, abb Durmaige, quieuit.
Alle, inghean Riacan h-Ui Mail Ruanaidh, mortua est.
Mail Seachlaind h-Ua Neachtain &ersir; Gilla Beraigh h-Ua Sluaigheadhaigh do marbadh la Toirrdhealbhach, mac Ruaidhri h-Ui Conchubair, Anno Domini 1190.

p.date: Kal. Ian. 3. f., l. ii., Anno Domini M.c.xc.i(uel—ii)

div2.p: Ruaidhri h-Ua Conchubhair d'fagbhail Chonnacht &ersir; a dhul hi Cenel Conaill.

p.date: Kal. Ian. iiii. f., l. x. iii., Anno Domini M.c.xc.ii.

div2.p: Dorus proinntighi in Duibreiclesa ica denum la U Cathan na Croibhe &ersir; la íngin h-Ui Indeirghi.
Taichleach h-Ua Dubhda, ri h-Ua n-Amhalghaidh &ersir; h-Ua Fhiacrach Muaidhi, do marbadh do dá mac a mheicc fein.
Aedh h-Ua Flainn, taiseach Shil Mhaili Ruain, mortuus est.

p.date: Kal Ian. 6 .f., l. xx. iiii., Anno Domini M.c.xc.iii.

div2.p: Eochaidh O Baighill do marbadh do h-Uibh Fiachrach.
Mael Patraic O Cobthaigh do éc.
Cathal Mac Gaithne do éc.
Diarmait, mac Conbrogain h-Ui Dhíumasaigh taiseach Chlainne Mailighra &ersir; ri h-Ua Fhailghe fri ré fhada, mortuus est.
Cathal Odhur, mac Meg Carrthaigh, occisus est.
Der Fhorgaill, ingen Murchaidh h-Ui Mhail Sheachlaind, mortua est i m-Mainisdir Drochait Atha.
Muircheartach, mac Murchaidh Mic Murchadha, ri h-Ua Ceinnselaigh, mortuus est.

p.date: Kal. Ian.uii. f., l. u., Anno Domini M.c.xc.iiii.

div2.p: Domnall h-Ua Briain mac Toirrdhealbhaigh, .i., ri Muman do éc.
Gaill do thiachtain ar Innsi h-Ua Finntain &ersir; a cur ar eigin di.
Cú Midhe h-Ua Flainn do marbadh do Ghallaibh.
Mac mic Conchubhair, mic Domnaill Ghearrlamhaigh h-Ui Briain, do dhalladh &ersir; do sboichtheadh la Gallaibh.
Sluaidheadh la Gillibert Mac Goisdealbh gu h-Eas Ruaidh &ersir; ro impo as séin gan nach tarbhu da shluadhadh.

p.date: Kal. Ian. i. f., l. x. ui., Anno Domini M.c.xc.u.

div2.p: Echmharcach h-Ua Cathan do éc i Reicles Phoil.

Conchobur Mag Fhachtna do éc i reicles
Daire.
Sacart mór Ia do éc.
Mac In Cleirigh h-Ui Cathalan do marbadh.
Sitriuc h-Ua Gailmredhaigh do marbadh do Mac Duinn Shleibe.
Florith, mac Ríacan h-Ui Mail Ruanaidh, episcopus Ola Find, in Christo quieuit.
Sluaigheadh la h-Eain Do Cuirti &ersir; la mac h-Ugo De Laci do gabhail neirt ar Ghallaibh Laighean &ersir; Mumhan.
Domnall h-Ua Finn, comharba Chluana Fearta Brenaind, quieuit.

p.date: Kal. Ian. ii. f., l. xx. uii., Anno Domini M.c.xc.ui.

div2.p: Reicles Poil &ersir; Petair cona themplaibh &ersir; co m-bloidh moir don Rathaidh do loscadh.

Sluaghadh la Ruaidhri Mac Duinn Shleibe, co n-Gallaibh &ersir; co macaibh righ Connacht docum Ceneoil Eogain &ersir; Airrter. Tangatur dono Cenel n-Eogain Telcha Óac &ersir; Errter co Machaire Aird Macha, co tucsat cath doibh &ersir; cur mebaidh ar Mac Duinn Sleibhe &ersir; ro marbadh derg-ár a muinnteri ann, .i., da mac righ déc do Connachtaibh.

Muircertach, mac Muircertaigh h-Ui Lochlainn, rí Ceneoil Eogain &ersir; ridomna Erenn uile, .i., tuir gaiscidh &ersir; egnoma Leithi Cuinn, discailiudh Gall &ersir; caistel, tercbail cell &ersir; cadhus, do marbadh do Donnchadh, mac Bloscaidh h-Ui Cathan, a comairli Ceneoil Eogain uile: .i., iar tabairt na tri Scríne &ersir; Canoine Patraic fris i tempall
deiscertach Aird Macha reímhe-sin &ersir; rucadh co Daire Coluim Cille &ersir; ro h-adnaicedh co h-onorach.
Mac Bloscaidh h-Ua Cuirin do arcain Termainn Da Beócc &ersir; ro marbadh é féin inn co n-derg-ár a muinntere re sulbud cenn mís, tria mirbuil Da Beóc.

Isin bliadhain-sin dono do bris Domnall, mac Diarmata Mec Carrthaigh, cath ar Gallaibh Muman &ersir; Luimnich in ro marbh a n-derg-ar &ersir; in ro dichuir a Luimniuch iat iar séin &ersir; ro bris dá maidhm aile béos.

p.date: Kal. Ian. iiii. f., l. ix., Anno Domini M.c.xc.uii.

div2.p:
Sluaghadh la h-Eoan Do Chuirt co n-Gallaibh Uladh co h-Ess Craibhe, co n-dernsat caistel Cille Santan, cor falmaichedh tricha ced Ciannacht doibh. Isin caistel-sin imorro ro fagadh Roitsel Phitun co sochraiti 'maille fris. Táinic dono Roitsel Phitun ar creich co Port Daire, co ro airc Cluain Í &ersir; Enach &ersir; Derc Bruach. Ruc imorro Flaithbertach O Mael Doraidh .i., ri Conaill &ersir; Eogain co n-uathadh do Chonall &ersir; d'Eogan forro, co tucsat maidm ar traigh na h-Uathcongbala
forro, co ro marbadh a n-ar ann .i., 'mo mac Ardgail h-Ui Lochlainn, tre mirbail Coluim Cille &ersir; Cainnich &ersir; Brecan ro airgsetar ann.

Mac Gilla Eidich do Chiannachtaibh do shlat altara tempoill moir Dhaire Coluim Cille &ersir; do breith ceithri corn is fherr do boi i n-Erind eisti, .i., ím Mac Riabhach &ersir; ím Mac Solus &ersir; ím Corn h-Ui Mael Doraidh &ersir; im Cam Coraind &ersir; im Corn h-Ui Dochartaich. Ro bris imorro &ersir; tall a n-innmusa &ersir; a lasa dibh. Frith imorro isin tres loa iarna n-gait na seoit &ersir; íntí ro gat. Ocus ro crochadh é (.i., ic Crois na Riag) i n-einech Coluim Cille, 'sa h-altoir ro saraighedh ann.
Concobur O Cathan do éc.

Flaithbertach h-Ua Mael Doraidh, .i., ri Conaill is Eogain is Airgiall is cosnumaich Temhrach &ersir; ridamna Erenn uile: .i., Conall ar loechdacht, Cu Culaind ar ghaiscedh, Guaire ar eínech, Mac Lughach ar oglachus, a éc iar treblait thogaidhe i n-Inis Saimer, i quart Noin Febrai, isin trichatmadh bliadhain a fhlaithusa &ersir; isin nomadh bliadhain ar coicait a aisi. Ocus ro adhnacht a n-Druim Tuamha co h-onorach. Ocus gabais Echmarcach h-Ua Dochartaich righi Ceneoil Conaill fo cetoir &ersir; ni raibe acht caicthigis i righi, in tan tainig h-Eoan do Cuirt co sochraide moir
'maille fris tar Tuaim h-i Tir n-Eogain. Asseich co h-Ard Sratha; iar sin, timceall co Daire Coluim Cille co rabadar coic oidhche and. Imthighit imorro co Cnoc Nascain da n-imachur thairis. Tegait dono Cenel Conaill im Echmarcach h-Ua n-Dochartaich dia n-innsaighidh &ersir; do-ratsat cath doibh, du in ro marbadh da cet dibh, im a righ, .i., im Echmarcach &ersir; im Donnchadh h-Ua Taircert, .i., rig-thoisech Clainni Sneidhghile, .i., cuing einigh &ersir; eghnuma &ersir; comuirle Ceneoil Conaill uile &ersir; im Gilla m-Brighti h-Ua n-Dochartaich &ersir; im Mac Dubhan &ersir; im Mag Ferghail &ersir; im macaibh h-Ui m-Baighill et alios nobiles. Ocus ro airgset Inís n-Eogain &ersir; do-ratsat boroma mór eisti.
Concobar, mac mic Taidhg, rí Mhuighi Luirg &ersir; Muighi Ai, tuir ordáin &ersir; airechais, enich &ersir; comairchi Connacht uile, a éc iar n-aithrighi togaidhi i Mainistir Atha Do Laarc.

Mac Craith h-Ua Fhlaithbertaich, mac righ Tire Eogain, do marbadh &ersir; Mael Ruanaigh O Fercomais no O Cairellan, ard-toisech Clainni Diarmata, do marbadh &ersir; da marcach maithi da muinntir do marbadh.

p.date: Kal. Ian. u. f., l. xx., Anno Domini M.c.xc.uiii.

div2.p: Gilla Mac Liac h-Ua Brenan do athchur a comurbuis uadha &ersir; Gilla Crist h-Ua Cernaigh ar togha loech &ersir; cleirech Tuaisceirt Erenn do oirdned ina inadh i n-abdaine Coluim Cille.
Macc Briain Bhreiffnigh, mic Thoirrdealbaigh h-Ui Chonchubhair, do marbadh la Cathal Carrach, mac Conchubair Mhaenmhaighe.
No gumadh ar in Kallaind-so budh coir Ruaidhri h-Ua Conchobair do bheith.

p.date: U. cccc. iii.
Kal. Ian. ui. f., l. i., Anno Domini M.c.xc.ix.

div2.p: Ruaidhri h-Ua Concobair .i., mac Toirrdhealbhaigh h- Ui Conchubair, ri Erenn, in penitentia quieuit.
Cathalan h-Ua Mael Fhabaill, ri Cairrgi Brachaidhe, do marbadh d'O Deran &ersir; O Deran do marbadh annsein.

Sluaghadh la h-Eoan do Cuirt i Tir n-Eogain ar fut na ceall: .i., Ard Sratha &ersir; Rath Both do milliudh dó, no co roacht Daire, co raibhe annsin da oidhche for sechtmain ic milliudh Innsi h-Eogain &ersir; in tire archena &ersir; ní ragadh as fri ré fhota, no co toracht Aedh h-Ua Neill, lucht coic long, co Cill i l-Latharnu, co ro loisc ní don baile, co ro marb dis testa do fichit annsein. Annsein ro batar Gaill Muighe Line &ersir; Dal Araidhe, tri cet, ar a cinn, etir iarn &ersir; cen iarn &ersir; nír airighedur no co ro doirtsit 'na cenn ic loscadh in baile. Annsein tucsat debaidh ar lár in baile, co ro maidh ar Gallaibh &ersir; tucsat coic madhmannda o shein amach forra no co n-dechadur 'n-a longaibh &ersir; nir fagadh acht coicer do muinntir h-Ui Neill. Iar sin ro imthigh Sheoan, o 't-chuala sin postea.

Cacadh eter Conall is Eogan, .i., co tucsat Cenel Conaill rigi do U Eicnigh. Annsein táiníc 'na coinne co Termonn Da Beóc. Táiníc h-Ua
Neill co Feraibh Maighi Itha do thairmesc 'na coinne, co faca cach araile dibh &ersir; co ro mebaidh ar h-Ua n-Eicnígh &ersir; co fárgaibh braighti. As-sidhe, isin loo cetna, Aedh h-Ua Neill &ersir; Cenel Eogain, co ro airgset Cenel Conaill i m-Machaire Maighi h-Itha &ersir; co tucsat boroma n-diairmhidhe leo. Ocus is don creich h-isin do marbadh Níall h-Ua Duibh Dirma ar scéimhleadh. Iarsin, sluaghadh la h-Aedh h-Ua Neill &ersir; la Cenel n-Eogain co Machaire Muighi Itha do thabairt catha do Cenel Conaill, no co ro fhagsat Cenel Conaill in longport &ersir; co n-dernsat blaogodh sitha annsein.
Sidh do dhenamh do Chathal Chroibhdhearg h-Ua Choncubair re Cathal Carrach, mac Conchubair Maenmaighe &ersir; a tabairt h-is tir &ersir; ferann do thabairt do.

p.date: Kal. Ian. uii. f., l. x. ii., Anno Domini M.cc.

div2.p: Mael Issu Mac Gille Erain, aircinnech Cille Moire h-Ua Niallain &ersir; adhbur comarba Patraic, in pace quieuit.

Do-ronsat Gaill Uladh tri crecha i Tir n-Eogain &ersir; in tres crech do-ronsat, do gabsat longport ic Domnach Mor Muighi Imclair. Do cuirset crech mór imach. Táinig Aedh h-Ua Neill i n-aircis na creiche, co ro comruc do &ersir; na Gaill &ersir; co ro muidh ar Gallaibh &ersir; co tarait ar n-diairmídhe forro &ersir; ro éladur 'san aidhche co n-dechadur tar Túaim.
Sanctus Mauritius Uo Baetan i nh-I Coluim Cille in pace quieuit.
Crech la Ruaidhri Mac Duinn Sleibhe, co ní do Ghallaibh Midhe, co ro airgset Mainistir Phoil &ersir; Phetair, co nar fhagsat innti acht aen-boin.

Radub Mac Raedíg, toisech Ceneoil Oenghusa, do marbadh do Ghallaibh ar creich i
n-Aenarca Chéin.
Rollant, mac Uchtraigh, rí Gall Gaidhel, in pace quieuit.
Donnchadh Uaithneach, mac Ruaidhri h-Ui Chonchubhair, do marbadh lais na Saxaibh bhadar hi l-Luimniuch.

p.date: U. cccc.u.
Kal. Ian. ii. f., l. xx. iii., Anno Domini M.cc.i.

div2.p: Ruaidhri Mac Duinn Sleibhe, ri Uladh &ersir; cainnel gaiscidh na h-Erenn uile, do marbadh do Ghallaibh, .i., tria mírbuilibh Poil &ersir; Petair &ersir; Patraic ro sharaigh.
Tomaltach h-Ua Conchobair, comarba Patraic &ersir; ard-primaith Erenn uile do ecna &ersir; do crabadh, in pace quieuit.
Innarba Cathail Croibhderg h-Ui Conchobuir &ersir; righadh Cathail Carraigh i n-a inadh No comadh ar in Kalaind-si tuas tic innarba Cathail Croibdeirg.

Sloghadh la h-Aedh h-Ua Neill i foirithin Cathail Croibdeirg co Feraibh Muighi h-Itha &ersir; co n-Airghiallaibh co rangatar co Tech Baithin Airtigh, co ro shoisetur ann, co tangadur co h-Es Dara &ersir; co ruc orra Cathal Carrach co maithibh Connacht &ersir; Uilliam Burc co n-Gallaibh Luimnigh imaille fris &ersir; co ro mhuidh ar Thuaiscert n-Erenn &ersir; co fargbadh and h-Ua h-Eicnigh, airdrigh Airgiall et alii multi.

Sloghadh la Sheoan do Chuirt co n-Gallaibh Uladh &ersir; mac Ugo de Laci co n-Gallaibh Midhe i foirithin Cathail
Croibderg, co rangadur Cill Mic n-Duoch. Annsein táinig Cathal Carrach co Connachtaibh imaille fris &ersir; co ro cuirset cath &ersir; co ro muidh ar Ghallaibh Uladh &ersir; Midhe. I bail i r-rabadur na coic catha, ní tainíg as acht da chath dibh.

Aedh h-Ua Neill do athrighadh la Cenel n-Eogain &ersir; righadh Conchobuir Meg Lachlainn doibh &ersir; co n-derna creich h-i Tir n-Ennai, co tuc bú diairmidhe &ersir; co ro marb daine. Annsein táiníg Eicnechan h-Ua Domnaill co longais Ceniuil Conaill &ersir; cona slogh ar tír, co ro gabsat longport ic Gaeth in Cairrgin. Iarsin tangatur Clann Diarmata co Port Rois don leth aile do gabail frisin loingis. Iarsin ro leicthea orra na tri longa déc lan do sluagh, co ro maidh ar Clainn Diarmata. Iarsin tainig Mac Lachlainn .i., Conchubhar Beacc i n-a foirithin, co ro gonadh a ech &ersir; co torcair don escar-sin la Cenel Conaill i n-einech Coluim Cille &ersir; a comarba &ersir; a scrine ro dhomíadhaigh. Ocus triasan mirbail cetna ro marbh Conchobur Murchadh h-Ua Crichan, ri h-Ua Fiachrach.
Conchubhar na Glaisfheine h-U Ruairc do badhudh.
